job_title: Data Scientist, Signal Processing (South San Francisco, CA)
job_text: ['', 'Develop quality control and pre-processing tools for a broad range of digital data types.', ' Work with large, complex data sets in the sleep domain. Solve difficult, non-routine analysis problems, handling data challenges from a real-world setting. Develop quality control and pre-processing tools for a broad range of digital data types. Iterate on and build new models from wearable sensors using a combination of physical modeling, signal processing and machine learning approaches. Apply advanced analytical methods that process continuously measured physiological and cardiac features in a real-world population. Clearly communicate highly technical results and methods in well structured presentations/reports, as well as interact cross-functionally with a wide variety of people and teams. ', ' Python or similar. Exploratory and statistical data analysis (such as linear models, multivariate analysis, predictive modeling and stochastic models). Experience extracting and cleaning data sets. Physiological signal processing and analysis of time-series data. Machine learning (supervised and unsupervised methods). ', 'Clearly communicate highly technical results and methods in well structured presentations/reports, as well as interact cross-functionally with a wide variety of people and teams.', 'Apply advanced analytical methods that process continuously measured physiological and cardiac features in a real-world population.', 'Iterate on and build new models from wearable sensors using a combination of physical modeling, signal processing and machine learning approaches.', 'Familiarity with software engineering practices and experience developing production software.', '2+ years of relevant work experience (i.e., as a biomedical engineer, data scientist, computational biologist), including deep expertise and experience with cardiac signal processing.', '3+ Years experience with: Python or similar. Exploratory and statistical data analysis (such as linear models, multivariate analysis, predictive modeling and stochastic models). Experience extracting and cleaning data sets. Physiological signal processing and analysis of time-series data. Machine learning (supervised and unsupervised methods).  ', 'Experience with the analysis of wearable sensors and clinical data.', 'Masters degree in Computer Science or related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications', 'Physiological signal processing and analysis of time-series data.', 'Familiarity with Deep Learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch etc.).', ' Masters degree in Computer Science or related technical field, or equivalent practical experience. 3+ Years experience with: Python or similar. Exploratory and statistical data analysis (such as linear models, multivariate analysis, predictive modeling and stochastic models). Experience extracting and cleaning data sets. Physiological signal processing and analysis of time-series data. Machine learning (supervised and unsupervised methods).   ', 'Demonstrated willingness to both teach others and learn new techniques.', 'Work with large, complex data sets in the sleep domain. Solve difficult, non-routine analysis problems, handling data challenges from a real-world setting.', 'Minimum qualifications:', 'Exploratory and statistical data analysis (such as linear models, multivariate analysis, predictive modeling and stochastic models). Experience extracting and cleaning data sets.', 'Python or similar.', 'Preferred qualifications:', 'Solid Data Science Python experience (NumPy, SciPy, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, Matplotlib etc.).', 'Machine learning (supervised and unsupervised methods).', 'PhD degree in a quantitative discipline (e.g., biomedical engineering, computer science, applied mathematics or similar) or equivalent practical experience.', ' 2+ years of relevant work experience (i.e., as a biomedical engineer, data scientist, computational biologist), including deep expertise and experience with cardiac signal processing. Experience with the analysis of wearable sensors and clinical data. Solid Data Science Python experience (NumPy, SciPy, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, Matplotlib etc.). Familiarity with software engineering practices and experience developing production software. Demonstrated willingness to both teach others and learn new techniques. Familiarity with Deep Learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch etc.). PhD degree in a quantitative discipline (e.g., biomedical engineering, computer science, applied mathematics or similar) or equivalent practical experience.', 'Description']

['', 'Obie recently completed its Series A funding and we are looking to expand our highly valued engineering team with others who enjoy solving complex problems, creating elegant, scalable applications and working in a collaborative, team-oriented environment. We are very proactive evaluating and leveraging the ever-shifting technology landscape and are excited to be using such technologies as React, Typescript, GraphQL, Node.js and PostgreSQL, among others.', 'Competitive compensation and employee benefits package', 'The ideal candidate is a self-motivated, multi-tasker and demonstrated team-player. You will be a Senior Software Engineer responsible for the development of new software products and features, a well as enhancements to existing products. You should excel in working with large-scale applications and frameworks and have outstanding communication and leadership skills.\xa0', 'Support testing, quality assurance and deployment of new products and features', 'Qualifications:', 'Expertise in Javascript, React, Typescript, Node.js, GraphQL, Database', 'Experience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologies', 'Writing high-quality, high-performance, maintainable codeDesign, develop and support software including applications, databases and APIsCoordinate cross-functionally to insure projects meet business objectives and compliance standardsSupport testing, quality assurance and deployment of new products and featuresWriting and reviewing code specifications and participation in code reviewsMentoring team members and promoting coding standards and best practices', "Bachelor's degree (Computer Science or related field) preferred, but not required", 'Chicago, IL or remote', "Bachelor's degree (Computer Science or related field) preferred, but not required5+ years of relevant work experienceExpertise in Javascript, React, Typescript, Node.js, GraphQL, DatabaseExperience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologiesAbility to multitask, organize, and prioritize workExcellent communication skills and ability to work with distributed team members", 'Excellent communication skills and ability to work with distributed team members', 'Obie is an InsurTech start-up committed to providing the best technology, customer service and insurance products for property investors. Obie is on a mission to disrupt the small commercial and single and multi-family rental property insurance sectors, the way other InsurTech companies (think Lemonade, Hippo, Next, Root) have reinvented Auto, HomeOwners and Renters insurance. We are building innovative solutions for the habitational insurance industry and looking for experienced software engineers to join our growing team of talented technologists and insurance professionals.', 'Fast-paced, early stage start-up with opportunities for exponential personal and professional growth', 'Writing high-quality, high-performance, maintainable code', 'Writing and reviewing code specifications and participation in code reviews', 'Fast-paced, early stage start-up with opportunities for exponential personal and professional growthCompetitive compensation and employee benefits packageChicago, IL or remote', 'Design, develop and support software including applications, databases and APIs', 'Other Details:', 'Mentoring team members and promoting coding standards and best practices', 'Responsibilities:', '\xa0', 'Ability to multitask, organize, and prioritize work', '5+ years of relevant work experience', 'About Obie:', 'Coordinate cross-functionally to insure projects meet business objectives and compliance standards']

['', 'Applying clustering and classification techniques to identify clusters of customers based on purchase, demographics, and on-site behavior', 'You have worked extensively with machine learning (such as Tensorflow, Torch), natural language processing, and advanced analytics (e.g. time series, regression, neural networks, mathematical optimization)', 'This role is located in our NYC office, though we are remote for the foreseeable future.', 'You’ll be an embedded member of the Content and Data team, working with product, data engineering, and software engineering to build machine learning algorithms and solve complex problems around search and personalization. With more than 4 billion SKUs to manage, we are a living, breathing big data challenge. We’ve built the foundation of our data infrastructure and done the initial analysis -- you will be the catalyst to accelerate and optimize content discovery.', 'Developing and maintaining machine learning infrastructure that powers our ranking and recommendation models', 'You have the technical competence to perform advanced analyticsYou have coding experience, specifically wrangling (such as with Python, SQL, Java, and/or Scala) and analyzing (such as with Pandas or R) large datasetsYou have worked extensively with machine learning (such as Tensorflow, Torch), natural language processing, and advanced analytics (e.g. time series, regression, neural networks, mathematical optimization)You have built and applied clustering (such as k-means, hierarchical, and mean shift) and classification (e.g. k-nearest neighbor, logistic regression, decision tree, random forest) algorithms', 'Responsibilities', 'You will play an integral role in facilitating the already rapid growth of TeePublic by:', 'TeePublic is looking for a Data Scientist to join its growing team in NYC. This individual will be a highly motivated and organized self-starter with the ability to handle multiple priorities at once. This individual will be integral in helping scale a fast-paced, rapidly growing team with a culture built on passion, hard-work, and fun.', 'Job Requirements', 'Building production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize content discovery by utilizing advanced statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining techniques and marketing science researchDeveloping and maintaining machine learning infrastructure that powers our ranking and recommendation modelsUsing Natural Language Processing to understand content across product meta data and user searchesApplying clustering and classification techniques to identify clusters of customers based on purchase, demographics, and on-site behaviorUse models to address key growth challenges and provide meaningful insights on problems such as significance testing and A/B testing', 'You have coding experience, specifically wrangling (such as with Python, SQL, Java, and/or Scala) and analyzing (such as with Pandas or R) large datasets', 'About the Job', 'Use models to address key growth challenges and provide meaningful insights on problems such as significance testing and A/B testing', 'You have the technical competence to perform advanced analytics', 'You have built and applied clustering (such as k-means, hierarchical, and mean shift) and classification (e.g. k-nearest neighbor, logistic regression, decision tree, random forest) algorithms', 'Using Natural Language Processing to understand content across product meta data and user searches', 'Building production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize content discovery by utilizing advanced statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining techniques and marketing science research']

['', 'Play an important role on how electric grid capacity is forecasted', 'As our Software Engineer, you will:', 'Work on a very collaborate team', 'Create integration solutions that can successfully integrate across multiple systems within the environment and meet requirements.', 'Experience in Behavioral Driven Development or Test Driven Development', 'SQL', 'Experience designing and developing a microservices environment', 'Location: Carmel, Indiana or Eagan, Minnesota', 'Establish best practices', 'Cloud Technologies (AWS, Azure, REST API, Containerization Docker/Kubernetes)', 'Java', 'Were looking for extensive knowledge and experience in the following:', 'Do you have experience with Java, SOA (Service Oriented Architecture), writing microservices, Cloud technologies (AWS, Azure, REST API, Containerization Docker/Kubernetes), and want to make an impact with an interactive and collaborative team? If so, wed like to know about you!', 'We are hiring a Software Engineer for our team that manages resource adequacy and future demand for power. This team develops systems that help ensure the electric grid has capacity for the demand by collecting data regarding capacity. As we convert to more solar and wind, this team will be integral in implementing new strategies that will allow for growth of renewable energy.', 'Transformative innovation is happening in the electric industry; from digitalizing homes and distributed resources, to renewable energy and an ever-changing grid.']

Your role will be instrumental in guiding Springbrook's evolution to new database technologies across our application platforms for transactional and analytical purposes. You will help to develop and improve existing database, monitoring, alerting tools, provide updates to existing infrastructure, and extend and automate our service model.\xa0", 'MS degree in Computer Science/Information Systems or a related fieldUtilize automation tools to build, maintain and manage infrastructure (Terraform, Packer, Azure Runbooks, PowerShell)Assist in compliance initiatives (PCI, SOC, NIST, etc)Experience with agile development methodologiesExperience implementing complex service solutions following the latest architecture patternsExperience with modern cloud-based analytical database systems (i.e. Snowflake, Amazon RedShift, etc.)Experience with Azure security and compliance capabilities', 'Springbrook Software is the leader in cloud-based ERP and payments software for local municipal governments and special districts. More than 1,000 cities, towns, and districts from coast to coast use our suite of modern, high-performance solutions to manage their finances, payroll, and utility billing. ['', ' Provide informational briefings to explain methodologies and analytical findings to peers and customer stakeholders.', 'Experience with incorporating data science capability into Stakeholder strategy', 'Experience bridging data science strategy between leadership, IT, data scientists and other stakeholders.', 'US Citizenship is required due to federal government project requirements.', 'PhD (preferred) or master’s in data science, Mathematics, Analytics, Statistics or related field will take precedence for interviews.', '5 to 8 years of experience with programming languages (such as Python, R, Java, Ruby, Spark, or SQL), and statistical analytics (such as SAS, Matlab, R).', 'Good understanding of Databases, SQL, Hadoop, Hive and/or MapReduce', '3 to 5 years of experience with machine learning and deep learning modelling (with packages such as TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, etc.)', 'Experience developing research designs, including formulating testable questions, identifying and defining key concepts and variables, and matching appropriate methods to problems', 'Experience in analysis, processing, tagging, and indexing unstructured, semi-structured, and structured classified and unclassified data sets.', ' Perform statistical analysis, data mining, temporal and pattern analysis, correlation of events, predictive modelling, and pattern recognition.', ' Document and visualize analytics both temporally and spatially, and present analytic results and uncertainty to decision makers.', 'Sterling, VA', ' Independently develops customized algorithms to solve analytical problems with incomplete data sets and implements automated processes for efficiently producing scale models.', ' Finds and recommends new uses for existing data sources; designs, modifies, and builds new data processes; and builds large, complex data sets.', ' Independently conducts statistical modelling, machine learning modelling and experiment design, and tests and validates predictive models.', ' Provide architecture analysis and design implementation with detailed technology roadmaps and transition planning and master plans as required.', 'Data Scientist - Mid Level', 'Experience in data management, including cleaning and preparing data, and creating, structuring, and maintaining data sets', '5 to 8 years of experience with programming languages (such as Python, R, Java, Ruby, Spark, or SQL), and statistical analytics (such as SAS, Matlab, R).3 to 5 years of experience with machine learning and deep learning modelling (with packages such as TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, etc.)Experience in analysis, processing, tagging, and indexing unstructured, semi-structured, and structured classified and unclassified data sets.Experience developing research designs, including formulating testable questions, identifying and defining key concepts and variables, and matching appropriate methods to problemsExperience in data management, including cleaning and preparing data, and creating, structuring, and maintaining data setsExperience with incorporating data science capability into Stakeholder strategyExperience bridging data science strategy between leadership, IT, data scientists and other stakeholders.Good understanding of Databases, SQL, Hadoop, Hive and/or MapReducePhD (preferred) or master’s in data science, Mathematics, Analytics, Statistics or related field will take precedence for interviews.', ' Investigate and implement new scientific analysis and methodologies to support big data analytics efforts and implement workflows, data models, indexes and templates and facilitate data movement on all associated systems and networks.']

['Experience with Team Foundation Server', 'Projects The Candidate Will Be Working On', " Transform health care and change the way consumers engage with technology. You have the opportunity to achieve great things while you showcase your passion and technical expertise as a Senior .NET Developer.  You'll be inspired by working alongside some of the most brilliant minds in technology who bring compassion, energy and focus to their work every day on a mission to change health care as we know it.  Join us! Come share who you are and start doing your life's best work.(sm) As part of our development team, you will predominantly be involved in building business solutions by creating new and modifying existing software applications.  You'll stretch your skills and grow your careers as a primary contributor in designing, coding, testing, debugging, documenting and supporting all types of applications consistent with the established specifications and business requirements in order to deliver business value.  This is a unique development role where custom solutions are engineered end-to-end with a focus on process automation. Positions in this function are responsible for designing, developing and supporting enterprise level custom applications, components and processes.  The candidate will operate within established methodologies and apply knowledge of principles and techniques to solve technical problems using innovative solutions. highest standards. New York Air Brake recognizes that railroads are in a highly competitive market and need to increase throughput by moving more trains more efficiently. Two keys to successfully meeting this challenge are electronic air brakes and train control systems. New York Air Brake is responding by taking a systems approach in the development of new products for rail applications. Over 10% of our total workforce is engineers involved in research and development of integrated train control products designed to help railroads build their market share in the 21st century. Currently, New York Air Brake is demonstrating its forward thinking by designing integrated train control systems that will help make Automated Train Control (ATC) a viable reality.", 'Required Experience:', '5-7+ years of relevant experience', 'Object Oriented Analysis and Design', 'Adaptability, Flexibility', 'Preferred Skills:', 'Software project planning, development and troubleshooting']

['\xa0', '', 'Commitment\xa0to what you\xa0build\xa0', 'We’re a small company, but we have a global reach. We work face-to-face with colleagues and collaborate across disciplines. But our clients, partners and operations are all over the world. Boku is a busy, exciting, and demanding place to work, but it’s the people that make the company. The mix of cultures, viewpoints, and experiences are vital for a global company like ours and every person’s contribution is valued. If you are looking for a new challenge in an exciting, innovative and international working environment, we are the ideal company for you.\xa0', '\xa03+ years of relevant software development experience\xa0', "Our team is looking for a Software Engineer to help us develop the platform and data abstractions that will scale as Boku continues to grow. As part of this team, you'll be working on message queues, implementing security best practices, and improving distributed data storage and data processing across Boku. You'll help solve operational challenges and find ways to make existing systems work better. You'll continue to look for new ways to take advantage of our cloud-based environments, in order to deliver more secure, reliable products, and you'll have the opportunity to shape our future.\xa0", 'Proficiency in at least one programming language such as Java, C++, C#, Go...\xa0', 'Love to improve how things\xa0work\xa0', 'Experience working with\xa0containers\xa0', "Platform team at Boku is responsible for a broad set of systems that provide core functionality that our product team uses to solve their business challenges. We're responsible for Messaging, Monitoring, Reliability Engineering, and a variety of other key areas that underpin\xa0all of\xa0Boku's products. We work to enable Boku to handle workloads that have increased every year, and to improve the efficiency and reliability of all engineering systems as we scale.\xa0", 'Incorporated in 2008, Boku is one of the world’s leading providers of carrier billing and mobile identity solutions. Using nothing more than a user’s mobile phone, Boku’s technology can verify a user’s identity, execute a payment, or provision a new service, radically simplifying common, everyday mobile interactions between consumers and businesses. This is possible because Boku’s platform can access the internal billing, identity, and sales systems of mobile operators globally. Businesses who utilize Boku’s platform include major brands such as Apple, Google, Microsoft, Sony, Facebook, Spotify, Netflix,\xa0Paypal, Experian, Fiserv, Western Union, Uber, and Discover. Boku was originally financed through top-tier investors including Andreessen Horowitz, Benchmark, DAG Ventures, Index Ventures, Khosla Ventures and NEA. Today, Boku is publicly traded on the AIM Market of the London Stock Exchange (AIM: BOKU.L)\xa0\xa0', 'We are looking for someone who has:\xa0', 'About Boku:\xa0\xa0']

job_title: Data Engineer in Cyber and Machine Learning - Early Career
job_text: ['', ' Please be aware that the Department of Energy (DOE) prohibits DOE employees and contractors from having any affiliation with the foreign government of a country DOE has identified as a “country of risk” without explicit approval by DOE and Battelle. If you are offered a position at PNNL and currently have any affiliation with the government of one of these countries you will be required to disclose this information and recuse yourself of that affiliation or receive approval from DOE and Battelle prior to your first day of employment. ', 'Technical knowledge of data domains specific to cyber security, information assurance, and identifying anomalous computer activity.', 'The Data Engineer should have working knowledge in one or more of the following related-skillsets:', 'Acquiring/integrating data within a distributed environment (e.g., AWS, Azure, OpenStack, Databricks, Hadoop)', 'Active Federal Q Clearance and ability to maintain such clearance.', 'Indexing services or log analysis tools (Splunk, Elasticsearch, Solr, Cloudwatch).', 'Drug Testing: All Security Clearance (L or Q) positions will be considered by the Department of Energy to be Testing Designated Positions which means that they are subject to applicant, random, and for cause drug testing. In addition, applicants must be able to demonstrate non-use of illegal drugs, including marijuana, for the 12 consecutive months preceding completion of the requisite Questionnaire for National Security Positions (QNSP).', 'Perform basic tasks and activities with minimal oversight in a team environment; interact regularly with team members, principal investigators and project managers.', 'Job Description', 'Organization and Job ID', 'Requirements', 'Background Investigation: Applicants selected will be subject to a Federal background investigation and must meet eligibility requirements for access to classified matter in accordance 10 CFR 710, Appendix B.', 'Scalable/massively parallel databases (Hive, Redshift, Impala, Athena, DynamoDB)', 'Data pipeline development (Python, NiFi, Spark, Kafka, AWS Glue, Kinesis)', 'Other Information', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Contribute to multiple projects simultaneously and work effectively in a dynamic team environment with high expectations for quality.', ' Active Federal Q Clearance and ability to maintain such clearance. Technical knowledge of data domains specific to cyber security, information assurance, and identifying anomalous computer activity. ', ' U.S. Citizenship Background Investigation: Applicants selected will be subject to a Federal background investigation and must meet eligibility requirements for access to classified matter in accordance 10 CFR 710, Appendix B. Drug Testing: All Security Clearance (L or Q) positions will be considered by the Department of Energy to be Testing Designated Positions which means that they are subject to applicant, random, and for cause drug testing. In addition, applicants must be able to demonstrate non-use of illegal drugs, including marijuana, for the 12 consecutive months preceding completion of the requisite Questionnaire for National Security Positions (QNSP). ', ' The Data Engineer should have working knowledge in one or more of the following related-skillsets: Data pipeline development (Python, NiFi, Spark, Kafka, AWS Glue, Kinesis) Indexing services or log analysis tools (Splunk, Elasticsearch, Solr, Cloudwatch). Computer networking, protocols, IP packet structure, and capture tools Acquiring/integrating data within a distributed environment (e.g., AWS, Azure, OpenStack, Databricks, Hadoop) Scalable/massively parallel databases (Hive, Redshift, Impala, Athena, DynamoDB) Interest, curiosity and technical depth to support the development and advancement of a variety of applied problems specific to the national security community. Perform basic tasks and activities with minimal oversight in a team environment; interact regularly with team members, principal investigators and project managers. Contribute to multiple projects simultaneously and work effectively in a dynamic team environment with high expectations for quality. ', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Interest, curiosity and technical depth to support the development and advancement of a variety of applied problems specific to the national security community.', 'Computer networking, protocols, IP packet structure, and capture tools', 'U.S. Citizenship', 'Equal Employment Opportunity']

company performance across the different capitals in real time', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Demonstrated intellectual curiosity, e.g., published articles, honors thesis, or written description of a unique approach to investing', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A high level of self-awareness\xa0in order to participate fully in a culture that honors “creative tension,” demands “unvarnished” discussion and debate, and seeks to generate outsized performance for our clients.\xa0\xa0Ours is a horizontal culture where authority is earned not assigned.', 'The Creative Data Scientist Role', 'TILT is a mission-aligned investment management firm, providing customized investment solutions to institutions and individuals seeking to generate both financial and non-financial returns.\xa0\xa0TILT designs and implements investment portfolios through both i) direct investments in a range of enterprises and ii) in public market investments to satisfy each client’s unique financial and non-financial objectives.\xa0\xa0We are a group of investment professionals (with backgrounds ranging from Putnam Investments to Goldman Sachs to private equity) who have “jumped the gap”: with work experience managing billions of dollars globally across all asset classes for clients as well as building and operating social enterprises that have improved well-being for people around the world.\xa0\xa0We bring experience and judgement together with a creative drive to reimagine how capital markets can regenerate civic, environmental, financial and human capital for our clients.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa02-5 years experience applying various data engineering, data science, and machine learning techniques', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passion for overcoming obstacles', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with best-in-class cloud computing and data pipeline infrastructure', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa02-5 years experience working with an investment firm managing money, ideally across multiple asset classes', 'The role requires an enormous degree of flexible thinking to apply traditional and innovative tools to developing and managing this data.\xa0\xa0We operate as a lean team with overlapping responsibilities, and collaboration and cooperation are critical values in our culture.', 'About You', '–\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Converting that data into insights that tell us something about the historical and projected financial, human, environmental, and / or civic capital impact of a particular company', 'The\xa0Creative Data Scientist (CDS)\xa0will be part of our investment team with clear oversight of critical investment functions. Discovery within TILT’s investment process begins with defining an investable universe of opportunity.\xa0\xa0Through a multi-capital lens, this involves exploring various investments in both public and private markets by accessing complex data sets.\xa0\xa0Some of these data sets are refined, published and available for purchase.\xa0\xa0Most of the ones we are seeking are raw, unrefined and require some effort to build.\xa0\xa0Building and managing data sits at the heart of our alpha and risk engines.\xa0\xa0We are building scalable infrastructure that enables us to provide unique customized solutions through common practice.', '–\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Contributing to the design and maintenance of our data ingestion / ETL pipelines', '\xa0Creative Data Scientist (CDS)', '\xa0', 'Specifically, your responsibilities would include:', 'To be considered, please submit your resume and a cover letter to Tom Haslett (tom@tiltinvestments.com) expressing your passion for the mission and fit for the role.', 'The ideal candidate will have:', '**Remote work. Current employees are in Seattle, Denver, Boston and New York**', 'You are a creative individual who has a passion for developing innovative approaches to solving investment challenges, and a commitment to applying rigorous quantitative analysis in pursuit of this goal.\xa0\xa0You are curious.\xa0\xa0You don’t take ‘no way’ for an answer.\xa0\xa0Data is a playground for you, and you are excited to find new ways to aggregate, organize data sets to support innovative thinking and creative decision making.\xa0\xa0Culture is a critical determinant of our shared (clients, colleagues, firm) success.\xa0\xa0You are committed to building an inclusive environment where risk-taking is rewarded and where collaboration is celebrated.\xa0\xa0You are both authentic and self-aware: confident in what you know and curious to learn what you don’t.']

['', '\xa0', 'You will work with curious, driven teammates to build sophisticated search and delivery tooling on top of a unique registry of small business profiles.\xa0You will collaborate with data scientists, product managers, and engineers–all of whom are eager to embrace change to improve. You will have a platform to influence our engineering and product landscape.', '·\xa0Identifies problems that others aren’t seeing and makes sure they get solved', '·\xa0Prides themselves on writing highly readable, thoroughly tested code (we use Python)', '·\xa0Designs creative solutions to reliably deliver data and insights to customers', '·\xa0Is driven to work with customers to have an impact on the real world', 'The Role:', 'As a Senior Software Engineer, your mission is to create the infrastructure that connects users to our rich analytical tools and data insights. As we pursue our mission of providing customers with unique insights on small businesses, your work will be integral to seamlessly delivering these insights.\xa0', "Rapidly growing global data intelligence firm seeks Senior Software Engineer. The company builds world-class data infrastructure, developer-friendly APIs, and intelligent tools to automate trusted decisions about every business. They're focused on making B2B risk frictionless so that their customers can focus on growing their businesses and radically improving their products and experiences.", '·\xa0Solves problems with containers, cloud infrastructure and infrastructure as code (we use Docker, AWS and Terraform)', 'Apply now to learn more!', '·\xa0Gets excited when working as part of a motivated, collaborative team', '·\xa0Engineers best-in-class model-driven search infrastructure at scale (we use Elastic)', 'Responsibilities:', 'As a core member of the team, you will share technical ownership of our search and delivery infrastructure with a team of motivated, product-minded individuals.']

job_title: Software QA Automation Engineer - Big Data
job_text: ['', 'Define the operating procedures, service monitors and alerts and work with the NOC team to get them implemented.', 'Strong understanding of testing methodologies.', 'Review product specifications and write test cases, develop test plans for assigned areas.', 'Benefits: Our benefits package includes the best of what leading organizations provide, such as stock options, paternity/maternity leave, plus many extra perks. As well, when we’re back in the office, we all benefit from a kitchen loaded with healthy snacks and drinks and catered lunches twice a week, and much more!', 'PubMatic is hiring a Software QA Automation Engineer to join our growing team in Redwood City. Due to the global pandemic, this role will be remote (working from home) until further notice.', 'Additional Information', 'Define test strategy and write test plan for the data platform enhancements and new features/services built on it', 'Preferred language Python/Shell Scripting', 'Coronavirus notice', 'Since 2006, PubMatic has created an efficient, global infrastructure and remains at the forefront of programmatic innovation. Headquartered in Redwood City, California, PubMatic operates 14 offices and nine data centers worldwide.', 'PubMatic delivers superior revenue to publishers by being the sell-side platform of choice for agencies and advertisers. The PubMatic platform empowers independent app developers and publishers to maximize their digital advertising monetization while enabling advertisers to increase ROI by reaching and engaging their target audiences in brand-safe, premium environments across ad formats and devices.', 'Coronavirus notice: PubMatic is actively working to ensure candidate and employee safety. Currently, all hiring and onboarding processes at PubMatic will be carried out remotely (working from home/WFH) through virtual meetings until further notice.', 'Diversity and Inclusion', 'Should have minimum of 3 years of experience on working BigData technologies', 'QA with good hands-on experience with Unix/LinuxQA experience in Networking and/or Big Data domainAutomation experience into PythonQA Methodologies understanding', 'Good debugging skills', 'Good to have', 'Benefits', 'Testing big data ingestion and aggregation flows using spark, shell and related queriesDeveloping automation framework using programming languages such as python and automate the big data workflows such as ingestion, aggregation, ETL processing etcDebugging and troubleshooting issues within the big data ecosystemSet up the Big data platform and Hadoop ecosystem for testingDefine test strategy and write test plan for the data platform enhancements and new features/services built on itDefine the operating procedures, service monitors and alerts and work with the NOC team to get them implemented.Responsible for system & performance testing of the data platform and applicationsSolve problems and establish plans and provide technical consultation in the design, development and test effort of complex engineering projectsReview product specifications and write test cases, develop test plans for assigned areas.Identifies issues and technical interdependencies and suggest possible solutionsRecreate complex customer and production reported issues to determine root cause and verify the fix.', 'Identifies issues and technical interdependencies and suggest possible solutions', 'We are looking for individuals with knowledge and experience of working with distributed environments for becoming a part of our big data test engineering group. The individual will also be responsible for automating various big data flows, performance engineering and fine-tuning the big data pipeline and making sure the quality of the above-mentioned giant business-critical infrastructure is intact. The individual will also get an opportunity to work with the high-speed GPU machines used for rapid computing of large data sets.', 'Recreate complex customer and production reported issues to determine root cause and verify the fix.', 'Knowledge of relational databases and SQL', 'Hands-on experience in working on Big Data technologies like Hadoop, Spark', "Hands-on Experience in Automating Backend Applications (e.g. db, REST API's)", 'QA experience in Networking and/or Big Data domain', 'Duties And Responsibilities', 'Job Description', 'PubMatic is one of the leaders in the tech stack when it comes to Big data infrastructure and data processing. We at PubMatic process more than 150 Bn ad impressions a day which contribute to around 100 terabytes of uncompressed data. To maintain and process this raw data we have our own data centers across the globe and do in-house ingestion, ETL and aggregation using a mammoth Hadoop infrastructure on top of thousands of BareMetal nodes built from scratch. Having most things built in house, PubMatic is a very early adaptor of new technologies that come along in the big data space.', 'Qualifications', 'Primary (Mandatory) Skills', 'Testing big data ingestion and aggregation flows using spark, shell and related queries', 'Debugging and troubleshooting issues within the big data ecosystem', 'Diversity and Inclusion: PubMatic is proud to be an equal opportunity employer; we don’t just value diversity, we promote and celebrate it. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Solve problems and establish plans and provide technical consultation in the design, development and test effort of complex engineering projects', 'Strong understanding of OS and performance benchmarking', 'Good verbal and written communication skills.', 'Company Description', 'QA Methodologies understanding', 'Responsible for system & performance testing of the data platform and applications', 'Experience in Big data platform & data analytics testing is an advantage.The Software QA Engineer will have the end to end ownership of feature starting from testing, automation (if applicable), deployment and helping with monitoring of the feature(s)', "Should have minimum of 3 years of experience on working BigData technologiesHands-on Experience in Automating Backend Applications (e.g. db, REST API's)Hands-on QA Automation Framework development & Design & Strong hold on data structuresPreferred language Python/Shell ScriptingStrong understanding of OS and performance benchmarkingQuick learner and good team member with a positive attitudeGood verbal and written communication skills.", 'Automation experience into Python', 'Set up the Big data platform and Hadoop ecosystem for testing', 'Hand on experience in working with ETL Testing', 'Quick learner and good team member with a positive attitude', 'The Software QA Engineer will have the end to end ownership of feature starting from testing, automation (if applicable), deployment and helping with monitoring of the feature(s)', 'Hands-on experience with Automating any backend applications (e.g db , server-side)', 'Strong working experience working in data workflows such as ingestion, aggregation, ETL processing etc', 'Hands-on experience in QA Automation Framework development & Design & Strong hold on data structures', 'QA with good hands-on experience with Unix/Linux']

['', 'This role is a mix of new development and support and in addition to solid C development skills, we would expect you to have scripting experience with Bash or something similar.\xa0\xa0We do some backend RDBMS SQL calls so would expect you to have some SQL skills as well.\xa0\xa0', 'To be qualified for this role, you should have the following skills and experience:', 'Used Bash or other types of scripting in UNIX/Linux', 'JSON/XML parsing', 'DESCRIPTION:\xa0', '5+ years of recent programming experience with C in a Linux / UNIX environment.Prefer development experience with high transaction processing systems and have used techniques such as multi-threading and memory maps.Used Bash or other types of scripting in UNIX/LinuxSome SQL development - familiar with SQLSome preferences for this opportunity would include: TCP/IP socket programmingJSON/XML parsingShared memory and memory mappingAs mentioned, SQL development', 'As mentioned, SQL development', 'Title: C / UNIX Software Engineer', 'Salary: $120,000', 'Some SQL development - familiar with SQL', 'Location: Atlanta, GA (remote)', 'Visas: US Citizen or Green Card only', 'Prefer development experience with high transaction processing systems and have used techniques such as multi-threading and memory maps.', 'Some preferences for this opportunity would include: TCP/IP socket programming', 'Shared memory and memory mapping', 'DESCRIPTION:\xa0\xa0Do you have recent development experience with C in an UNIX/Linux environment?\xa0Looking for a great company with stable employment where you could work with other Software Engineers in a team environment?\xa0\xa0Due to growth, we are adding several C/Linux Software Engineers to our team and looking for experienced Software Developers that preferably have experience working with high transaction types of environments.\xa0\xa0', '5+ years of recent programming experience with C in a Linux / UNIX environment.']

', 'protection', ' Communicate and collaborate among cross-functional teams in a multinational environment ', ' Skills  : ', ' Must adapt to rapidly changing projects and requirements ', ' Challenge ', ' Researching and innovating ', ' Job Description  Responsibilities  : ', ' Strong coding and debugging skills in Java, C/C++, Perl, any other scripting languages ', ' Strategic thinker, yet with a bias towards action ', ' Be a part of a development team following the AGILE development process, responsible for delivering feature content including test automation for product releases  Responsible for implementing, testing, and maintaining of software modules across platforms (Unix, Linux, Windows) with a high-quality standard  Participate in reviews of requirements, design, source code, and supporting documentation  Troubleshoot and resolve product issues through teamwork  Participate in improvement of existing development and testing procedures and processes  Communicate and collaborate among cross-functional teams in a multinational environment  Researching and innovating  Experience working on technologies related to Cloud, Kubernetes, Storage and Virtualization ', ' Knowledge of enterprise level software deployment and databases ', ' Job Description ', 'availability', ' Be a part of a development team following the AGILE development process, responsible for delivering feature content including test automation for product releases ', " Veritas enables organizations to harness the power of their information, with solutions designed to serve the world’s largest and most complex heterogeneous environments. Veritas NetBackup is the world's leading backup and recovery solution for enterprise data centers and hybrid clouds. With its vast array of hardware, operating system, virtualization, database, application, and storage-related technologies, the modern data center is a complicated place. That’s why NetBackup has long been the trusted choice for enterprises seeking to reduce that complexity and make data protection as manageable as possible for their limited staff. ['', 'Wildsparq launched in 2014 and has become one of the fastest growing companies in Birmingham. Wildsparq offers a consistent and intentional leader development strategy delivered through an online platform. We exist\xa0to help companies build incredible cultures by equipping leaders and giving them tools to develop other leaders.\xa0Wildsparq is in high-growth mode and needs to bring on talented leaders who will be fired up to live out the vision of “Building Multiplying Movements of Multiplying Leaders in the For Purpose Marketplace”. Node.js, React, GraphQL, and Java a plus', 'Experience working with cloud-based applications (AWS) a plus', 'Here’s why we think you should come work for Wildsparq:', 'Our team promises you a clear personal and professional growth plan.', 'Job Description', 'Qualifications', 'Buy-in to the vision, mission, and values of Wildsparq\xa0', 'Meet and interact with the sales and customer success teams to plan features', 'Passionate about engaging with people and serving customers', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience preferred", 'Experience in front-end and back-end software development', 'Participate in backlog refinement and sprint planning for projects', 'Here’s why we think you should come work for Wildsparq:\xa0', 'You will join a young and growing company currently experiencing rapid client and sales growth.You will join an amazing culture with a supportive, competitive team.You will have the opportunity to help further build this company by implementing your own ideas for the team to execute.Our team promises you a clear personal and professional growth plan.', 'Wildsparq, a SaaS company, is searching for a sharp and driven Software Engineer to come join the team at Wildsparq. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, ethnicity, religion, creed, sex, pregnancy, lactation/breastfeeding, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, citizenship, ancestry, age, marital status, familial status, disability, genetic information, protected veteran status, military status, or any other characteristic protected by local, state, or federal laws, rules, or regulations. DJJ hires and promotes individuals solely on the basis of their qualifications for the job to be filled. If you’d like more information on your EEO rights under the law, please click here.', 'Ability to perform moderately complex requirements development, coverage analysis, impact analysis and modification.', 'Working at the David J. Joseph Company is unique. We offer employment in diverse settings such as traditional corporate headquarters, dynamic sales locations, and scrap recycling facilities. This workplace diversity gives our employees the variety they crave and the exposure to a global business. A career at The David J. Joseph Company is ideal for self-starters seeking to make an impact on our company and their careers.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Software Engineering, Business or related discipline. Equivalent combination of experience and education will also be considered.Minimum 2 – 5 years related experience in designing, coding, testing, debugging, documenting, maintaining and deploying web-based, multi-tiered business software solutions.Experience designing, developing and optimizing MS SQL databases.Strong debugging, troubleshooting and analytical skills.Minimum 1 year experience in the following technologies: C#, ASP.NET, MS SQL, HTML, JavaScript, CSS.Ability to perform moderately complex requirements development, coverage analysis, impact analysis and modification.Ability to lead requirements effort on routine to moderately complex projects.Demonstrates working knowledge, practical skills and the ability to perform work under moderate supervision.Must be detail-oriented with the ability to manage multiple assignments effectively.Requires effective communication skills to convey status, ideas and concepts in a team environment.Requires a professional demeanor with a high degree of flexibility, responsiveness and self-direction.Non-routine issues are often discussed with / referred to more experienced staff.Work is typically focused on short-term objectives (6 months or less) and reviewed frequently for assessment and direction.Minimal travel required.', 'Minimum 1 year experience in the following technologies: C#, ASP.NET, MS SQL, HTML, JavaScript, CSS.', 'DJJ reasonably accommodates qualified individuals with disabilities to enable them to receive equal employment opportunity and/or perform the essential functions of the job, unless the accommodation would impose an undue hardship to the Company. This applies to all applicants and teammates.', 'Qualifications ']

['', ' Analyzes and formulates architectural and functional specifications, interfaces, and data structures. ', ' Apply knowledge of computer science concepts and techniques, mathematics, and methods of statistical analysis to develop and apply automated solutions to engineering, scientific, or business data acquisition and management problems.  Uses mathematical, statistical, and scientific logic to identify conceptual or theoretical solutions to problems of automated data processing (ADP) hardware or software systems design and operations.  Analyzes and formulates architectural and functional specifications, interfaces, and data structures.  Researches applications for ADP hardware, software, and operating systems.  Writes, modifies, and adapts computer programs in machine level, assembly, and third or fourth generation programming languages.  All candidates should be prepared to participate in processes applicable to full software development lifecycle activities including requirements, design, development, integration and test.  Self-motivated individual willing to learn and work in a fast-paced environment.  May act as team leader or supervisor, developing project plans, guidelines, or controls, and directing the work of other computer scientists, specialists, and technicians. ', ' Knowledge of agile development; familiarity with the Atlassian suite is a plus. ', ' Candidate must be able to obtain a Secret clearance. ', 'Overview', ' Writes, modifies, and adapts computer programs in machine level, assembly, and third or fourth generation programming languages. ', ' BS degree in a Computer Science, Computer Systems Information Management, Electrical Engineering or Mathematics. ', ' Researches applications for ADP hardware, software, and operating systems. ', ' Candidates will be required to pass a background check for this position. ', ' Apply knowledge of computer science concepts and techniques, mathematics, and methods of statistical analysis to develop and apply automated solutions to engineering, scientific, or business data acquisition and management problems. ', ' Knowledge of computer hardware and software systems including, but not limited to Red Hat Enterprise Linux, CentOS, Ubuntu, Solaris UNIX, Microsoft Windows, mass-storage devices, local area networks (LANs) and virtualization. ', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications', ' BS degree in a Computer Science, Computer Systems Information Management, Electrical Engineering or Mathematics.  10+ years of computer science experience.  Knowledge of computer hardware and software systems including, but not limited to Red Hat Enterprise Linux, CentOS, Ubuntu, Solaris UNIX, Microsoft Windows, mass-storage devices, local area networks (LANs) and virtualization.  Able to develop software using structured top-down methods in Java, C, C++, C#, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Ada, and scripting in Linux and/or UNIX environment.  Knowledge of agile development; familiarity with the Atlassian suite is a plus.  Candidate must be able to obtain a Secret clearance.  Candidates will be required to pass a background check for this position. ', ' Uses mathematical, statistical, and scientific logic to identify conceptual or theoretical solutions to problems of automated data processing (ADP) hardware or software systems design and operations. ', ' May act as team leader or supervisor, developing project plans, guidelines, or controls, and directing the work of other computer scientists, specialists, and technicians. ', ' 10+ years of computer science experience. ', ' Self-motivated individual willing to learn and work in a fast-paced environment. ', ' Able to develop software using structured top-down methods in Java, C, C++, C#, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Ada, and scripting in Linux and/or UNIX environment. ', ' All candidates should be prepared to participate in processes applicable to full software development lifecycle activities including requirements, design, development, integration and test. ']

['  Essential Functions I  Present using data visualization techniques and demonstrate the effectiveness/usefulness of dashboards, analysis and findings to small and large groups.  Perform statistical analysis (e.g., linear regression, logistic regression, decision trees, t tests, data/text mining, SVM, etc.) to obtain useful insights from data.  Utilize machine learning techniques to automate and increase efficiency of analysis.  Mine and analyze data from company databases to drive optimization and improvement of clinical and business processes.  Manipulate large data sets and use them to identify trends and reach meaningful conclusions to inform strategic business decisions, including optimization of clinical processes.  Create dashboards containing visualizations, data tables, value boxes, etc. within RStudio.  Effectively acquire, organize and synthesize quantitative data to discover trends and patterns.  Identify actionable opportunities from these trends and patterns for clinical staff to drive process improvement across the organization.  Collaborate with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business solutions. ', ' Equipment/Machinery/Tools ', ' Ability to effectively tell the story of the data to non-technical audiences. ', ' Effectively acquire, organize and synthesize quantitative data to discover trends and patterns. ['', '4 to 10 years’ experience in statistical modeling, machine learning techniques, data mining, feature creation, decision sciences, or other analyticsExperience with statistical tools such as R, SAS, or PythonExcellent communication skills, both oral and written, and the ability to communicate technical analysis and findings clearly to senior leaders and non-technical audiencesExcellent business acumen skills including the ability to translate analytic findings into business strategies that make sense for the business modelBS in Data Science, Business Analytics, Math, Statistics, or related field', '4 to 10 years’ experience in statistical modeling, machine learning techniques, data mining, feature creation, decision sciences, or other analytics', 'Collaborate with the team to identify and evaluate opportunities to utilize data analytics to maximize program success.', 'MS degree in Data Science, Business Analytics, Math, Statistics, or related field', 'Design test and learn projects to ensure they meet statistical standards of size and readability.\xa0Assist the operations team in implementing design into production.', 'Experience with large scale relational databases and other complex platforms', 'Experience with large scale CRM programs', 'Required experience and education-', 'Ongoing expansion, maintenance, and updates of Power BI data structure as needed.', 'Complete ad-hoc requests to support tactical and strategic business needs.', 'Forecast CRM production volumes and KPIs monthly. Adjust forecasts based on variance to actuals. Communicate changes in the forecast that deviate from established plans with the root cause of change and implications.', 'Use advanced analytic data techniques and statistical methods related to business analysis, data mining, design of experiments, and modeling, etc. to understand the business and recommend actions for improvements.', 'Experience with machine learning and optimized decision systems', 'Analyze the impact of all changes to the program utilizing pre/post, A/B, and other statistical comparison methods.\xa0Deliver results in appropriate format focusing on impact versus success metrics, implications to business, and next steps.', 'Excellent communication skills, both oral and written, and the ability to communicate technical analysis and findings clearly to senior leaders and non-technical audiences', 'Communicate analysis and findings clearly to senior leaders and non-technical audiences', 'BS in Data Science, Business Analytics, Math, Statistics, or related field', 'Preferred', 'Main responsibilities-', 'MS degree in Data Science, Business Analytics, Math, Statistics, or related fieldExperience with machine learning and optimized decision systemsExperience with large scale CRM programsExperience with large scale relational databases and other complex platforms', 'The data scientist will be responsible for providing advanced analytics across all aspects of our client’s brand platforms. This position will be filled as a senior analyst or manager dependent on the skills and experience of the selected candidate.', 'Use advanced analytic data techniques and statistical methods related to business analysis, data mining, design of experiments, and modeling, etc. to understand the business and recommend actions for improvements.Design test and learn projects to ensure they meet statistical standards of size and readability.\xa0Assist the operations team in implementing design into production.Analyze the impact of all changes to the program utilizing pre/post, A/B, and other statistical comparison methods.\xa0Deliver results in appropriate format focusing on impact versus success metrics, implications to business, and next steps.Develop machine learning models to drive business growth. The model builds should follow generally accepted methods and be deployable into the large/complex data structure.Forecast CRM production volumes and KPIs monthly. Adjust forecasts based on variance to actuals. Communicate changes in the forecast that deviate from established plans with the root cause of change and implications.Ongoing expansion, maintenance, and updates of Power BI data structure as needed.Complete ad-hoc requests to support tactical and strategic business needs.Collaborate with the team to identify and evaluate opportunities to utilize data analytics to maximize program success.Develop and gain alignment on best visualization content that is in line with industry best practices and ease of user adoption to convey the story inside the dataCommunicate analysis and findings clearly to senior leaders and non-technical audiences', 'Excellent business acumen skills including the ability to translate analytic findings into business strategies that make sense for the business model', 'Develop and gain alignment on best visualization content that is in line with industry best practices and ease of user adoption to convey the story inside the data', 'Experience with statistical tools such as R, SAS, or Python', 'Develop machine learning models to drive business growth. The model builds should follow generally accepted methods and be deployable into the large/complex data structure.']

['', 'Analyze historical data to identify trends and support decision making.', 'About Arteza:', 'Advanced proficiency with Python/R/SQL.', 'Translate business questions and concerns into specific quantitative questions that can be answered with available data using sound methodologies. In cases where questions cannot be answered with available data, work with engineers to produce the required data.Retrieve, synthesize, and present critical data in a format that is immediately useful to answering specific questions or improving system performance.Analyze historical data to identify trends and support decision making.Continually improving methodologies by developing new data sources, testing model enhancements, and fine-tuning model parameters.Provide requirements to develop analytic capabilities, platforms, and pipelines.Apply statistical or machine learning knowledge to specific business problems and data.\xa0Formalize assumptions, create statistical definition of the outlier, and develop methods to systematically identify these outliers - Work out why such examples are outliers and define if any actions needed.Given anecdotes about anomalies or generate automatic scripts to define anomalies, deep dive to explain why they happen, and identify fixes - Make Decisions or recommendations.Build decision-making models and propose solution for the business problem you defined.Conduct written and verbal presentation to share insights and recommendations to audiences of varying levels of technical sophistication.Work with statistical and machine learning models, data mining, unstructured data analytics in corporate environments.Assess model accuracy using custom metrics over complex date-time and categorical segments.Establish customer segments based on value, recency and customer type.', 'Communicate concisely and persuasively with engineers, product manager and marketing leaders managers.', 'Data Scientist ', 'Excellent problem solving, critical thinking, creativity, organizational, design, and interpersonal skills; ability to work well with all levels of engineers. Confirmed ability to handle multiple projects with strict deadlines.', 'Prior experience and continued interest in mentorship and technical development of junior data scientists.', 'The specific focus of this role is to lead all modeling efforts that support the strategy of CRM-based programs: Email, Direct Mail, Loyalty, and Outreach. This individual will maintain an active role in CRM database management, customer data capture and any related project as well as support CRM (Customer Outreach) Product Manager in monitoring data extracts between providers, partners and internal IT for data integrity and accuracy', 'Continually improving methodologies by developing new data sources, testing model enhancements, and fine-tuning model parameters.', 'Apply statistical or machine learning knowledge to specific business problems and data.\xa0', 'Production experience with Python scientific stack required.', 'Arteza\xa0is revolutionizing the Art Supply industry as one of the fastest growing brands and e-commerce retailers in the country. Recognized as the #1 fastest growing private company in South Florida, and ranked #32 on the Inc. 5000 list for 2020, we offer a convenient way to shop for art supplies coupled with a highly innovative product offering. Headquartered next to the beaches of Miami, we are quickly expanding the team. If you are interested in working in a fast paced, start-up environment with highly motivated entrepreneurs, this is the place for you.', '\xa0BA/BS in Computer Science Statistics, Mathematics, or other quantitative disciplines and 5+ years of experience with statistical modeling – OR –', 'Provide requirements to develop analytic capabilities, platforms, and pipelines.', 'Formalize assumptions, create statistical definition of the outlier, and develop methods to systematically identify these outliers - Work out why such examples are outliers and define if any actions needed.', 'Assess model accuracy using custom metrics over complex date-time and categorical segments.', 'Retrieve, synthesize, and present critical data in a format that is immediately useful to answering specific questions or improving system performance.', 'Arteza is seeking a results-driven\xa0Data Scientist to join our team in North Miami Beach, FL. The Data Scientist builds predictive models for Marketing Analytics within the retail industry and has strong proficiency with Python, R and Time Series Analysis. The Data Scientist develops and implements statistical analyses, summaries, and predictive machine learning models for use in marketing campaigns. The Data Scientist evaluates model effectiveness by using modern as well as classical statistical inference and provides model validation results to both data science and business partners. The Data Scientist will have sole ownership of one or more analytics projects at any given time as well as act a contributor to latter analytics projects executed by team members. The Data Scientist collaborates with data engineers and developers using DevOps technology (e.g., Git, GitHub, Jira, Confluence).', 'Establish customer segments based on value, recency and customer type.', 'Requirements:', 'Translate business questions and concerns into specific quantitative questions that can be answered with available data using sound methodologies. In cases where questions cannot be answered with available data, work with engineers to produce the required data.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Our opportunity:', 'Given anecdotes about anomalies or generate automatic scripts to define anomalies, deep dive to explain why they happen, and identify fixes - Make Decisions or recommendations.', '1+ years of experience working within AWS.', 'MS/Ph.D. in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics, or Statistics and 3+ years of experience with statistical modeling, with a minimum of 1 year of analytical experience in marketing analytics.', 'Build decision-making models and propose solution for the business problem you defined.', 'Conduct written and verbal presentation to share insights and recommendations to audiences of varying levels of technical sophistication.', 'Work with statistical and machine learning models, data mining, unstructured data analytics in corporate environments.', '\xa0BA/BS in Computer Science Statistics, Mathematics, or other quantitative disciplines and 5+ years of experience with statistical modeling – OR –MS/Ph.D. in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics, or Statistics and 3+ years of experience with statistical modeling, with a minimum of 1 year of analytical experience in marketing analytics.Production experience with Python scientific stack required.Advanced proficiency with Python/R/SQL.1+ years of experience working within AWS.Communicate concisely and persuasively with engineers, product manager and marketing leaders managers.Experience in AdTech or MarTech space is a plus.Prior experience and continued interest in mentorship and technical development of junior data scientists.Excellent problem solving, critical thinking, creativity, organizational, design, and interpersonal skills; ability to work well with all levels of engineers. Confirmed ability to handle multiple projects with strict deadlines.', 'Experience in AdTech or MarTech space is a plus.', 'Arteza']

job_title: Staff Data Scientist - League Data Central, Gameplay
job_text: ['', 'Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop)', 'Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices', 'Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL', 'Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience', 'Staff Data Scientist on the League Data Central team', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", ' Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop) Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP) Experience working in an Agile environment ', 'Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers', '===', 'Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing)', 'Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs', 'Required Qualifications', '.', ' Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing) Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization', 'Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game', 'Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience ']

['', 'Build out and operate our foundational data infrastructure: storage (cloud data warehouse, S3 data lake), orchestration (Airflow), processing (Spark, Flink), streaming services (AWS Kinesis & Kafka), BI tools (Looker & Redash), graph database, and real-time large scale event aggregation store.', 'Experience with AWS, and especially EMR, S3, Glue, Kinesis, IAM', ' Build out and operate our foundational data infrastructure: storage (cloud data warehouse, S3 data lake), orchestration (Airflow), processing (Spark, Flink), streaming services (AWS Kinesis & Kafka), BI tools (Looker & Redash), graph database, and real-time large scale event aggregation store. Build the next iteration of our ingestion pipeline for scale, speed, and reliability. Read from a variety of upstream systems (MongoDB, Postgres, DynamoDB, MySQL, APIs), in both batch and streaming fashion, including change data capture. Make it self-service for non-engineers. Build and evolve the tools that empower colleagues across the company to access data and build reliable and scalable transformations. This includes UIs and simple frameworks for derived tables and dimensional modeling, APIs and caching layers for high-throughput serving, and SDKs for the orchestration of complex Spark and Flink pipelines. Build systems that secure and govern our data end to end: control access across multiple storage and access layers (including BI tools), track data quality, catalogue datasets and their lineage, detect duplication, audit usage and ensure correct data semantics. ', 'Preferred (not Required)', 'Experience building data backend systems at scale with parallel/distributed compute', 'Experience building API layers and microservices', 'Build the next iteration of our ingestion pipeline for scale, speed, and reliability. job_text: ['', 'Architect, build & support new data marts across various products & applications.', 'About The Role', 'Substantial prior experience designing and building sophisticated, highly scalable / reliable data pipelines, using the Big Data ecosystem(Hadoop/Hive/Spark/Presto/Airflow/Kinesis or equivalents)', 'Prior experience shipping highly scalable applications on cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP) and database technologies (SQL/NoSQL/column-oriented datastores/distributed databases)', 'Passionate about mentorship, and coaching/onboarding/leading teammates.', 'Substantial prior experience designing and building sophisticated, highly scalable / reliable data pipelines, using the Big Data ecosystem(Hadoop/Hive/Spark/Presto/Airflow/Kinesis or equivalents)Understands the concepts behind distributed databases, and both streaming and batch processing systemsSoftware development experience with high proficiency in either Python, Java, Scala or another language.Prior experience shipping highly scalable applications on cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP) and database technologies (SQL/NoSQL/column-oriented datastores/distributed databases)Excellent communication skills and is comfortable understanding business requirements and translating code to non technical stakeholders.Passionate about data engineering / analytics and distributed systems.Passionate about mentorship, and coaching/onboarding/leading teammates.', 'Embody technical leadership role within the team and mentor junior engineers.', 'Passionate about data engineering / analytics and distributed systems.', 'Architect, build & support new data marts across various products & applications.Collaborate with engineers, product managers, data scientists & machine-learning engineers to understand data needs.Improve existing data processes and infrastructure by pioneering the adoption and use of new technologies within Zillow.Embody technical leadership role within the team and mentor junior engineers.', 'Excellent communication skills and is comfortable understanding business requirements and translating code to non technical stakeholders.', 'About The Team', 'Collaborate with engineers, product managers, data scientists & machine-learning engineers to understand data needs.', 'Zillow Group is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive, innovative environment with the best employees. Therefore, we provide employment opportunities without regard to age, race, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, disability, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, or any other protected status in accordance with applicable law. If there are preparations we can make to help ensure you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.', 'Software development experience with high proficiency in either Python, Java, Scala or another language.', 'Understands the concepts behind distributed databases, and both streaming and batch processing systems', 'Improve existing data processes and infrastructure by pioneering the adoption and use of new technologies within Zillow.']
