job_title: Sr Data Engineer (Open to Mars Hub Sites in Chicago, IL and NJ)
job_text: ['', 'The opportunity to work cross functionally, add value and impact a better world for generations to come.', 'An industry competitive compensation package including generous benefits', 'Experience in delivering across multi-location teams for global and local deliverables ', 'Technical expertise and experience in database and data engineering capabilities. ', 'Nice to have - Post-graduate qualifications in computer science, data engineering or related ', 'Nice to have - professional qualifications in advanced data design, big data', 'Lead and manage the design of our cloud-based data solutions and models to enable insight and analytics ', 'The opportunity to learn, develop and take charge of your own career. An industry competitive compensation package including generous benefitsCommitment to our Purpose and our Five Principles. An environment where all Associates feel valued, supported and comfortable being themselves at work. The opportunity to work cross functionally, add value and impact a better world for generations to come.', 'Able to partner effectively with the business stakeholders, contribute in overall success and drive value for relevant stakeholders ', 'An environment where all Associates feel valued, supported and comfortable being themselves at work. ', 'Experience in building a combined and effective onshore-offshore team with 3rd party partners ', 'Lead and manage the design of our cloud-based data solutions and models to enable insight and analytics Lead and manage engineering projects in collaboration with other team members (including with offshore talent partners) to ensure rapid development of quality, scalable and sustainable data solutions, with global best practices and consistency Drive agile processes and team sprints across global, market and offshore data engineering teams Ensure right technologies in place for our needs - deliver engagements with up-to-date capabilities available in the industry Engage and collaborate with data and IT owners across Mars to drive data quality and availability, and ensure data improvement plans in place and support effective governance Harvest and maintain semantic and smart data layer and ensure holistic leadership of the data solution within the environment Engage with senior leaders on data related strategies and adoption', 'The opportunity to learn, develop and take charge of your own career. ', 'Must have - Degree level in data engineering related subject Nice to have - Post-graduate qualifications in computer science, data engineering or related Nice to have - professional qualifications in advanced data design, big dataTechnical expertise and experience in database and data engineering capabilities. Rich heritage in designing and building databases, data warehouses, analytics and BI platforms, including in grocery/retail sector and ideally healthcare too including experience with Big Data. Including use of cloud platforms like AWS or Azure, technologies across traditional and contemporary software (e.g. SQLServer, Hadoop), programming languages such as SQL, Java, C#, C++, Python, R and visualization tools Track record in building and developing successful data teams of at least Experience in building a combined and effective onshore-offshore team with 3rd party partners Experience in delivering across multi-location teams for global and local deliverables Able to partner and engage with the Data Science community Able to partner effectively with the business stakeholders, contribute in overall success and drive value for relevant stakeholders ', 'Track record in building and developing successful data teams of at least ', 'Engage and collaborate with data and IT owners across Mars to drive data quality and availability, and ensure data improvement plans in place and support effective governance ', 'Including use of cloud platforms like AWS or Azure, technologies across traditional and contemporary software (e.g. SQLServer, Hadoop), programming languages such as SQL, Java, C#, C++, Python, R and visualization tools ', 'Lead and manage engineering projects in collaboration with other team members (including with offshore talent partners) to ensure rapid development of quality, scalable and sustainable data solutions, with global best practices and consistency ', 'Drive agile processes and team sprints across global, market and offshore data engineering teams ', 'Able to partner and engage with the Data Science community ', 'Rich heritage in designing and building databases, data warehouses, analytics and BI platforms, including in grocery/retail sector and ideally healthcare too including experience with Big Data. ', 'Engage with senior leaders on data related strategies and adoption', 'Must have - Degree level in data engineering related subject ', 'Harvest and maintain semantic and smart data layer and ensure holistic leadership of the data solution within the environment ', 'Commitment to our Purpose and our Five Principles. ', 'Ensure right technologies in place for our needs - deliver engagements with up-to-date capabilities available in the industry ']

['', 'Collaboration - Working together to identify solutions to current problems', 'You have excellent verbal and written communication skills with a focus on good technical writing.', 'Experience working in highly regulated industries like finance, health care or defense.', 'You are practiced in working with AWS cloud architecture, including products such RDS, S3, ECS, Lambda, DynamoDB, API Gateway and CodeDeploy.Demonstrated hands on software development projects in Python or JavaScript is required. You have direct experience in software design, build, deployment, version control, configuration and testing of applications using modern best practices.You are experienced with AWS infrastructure modeling tools, including CDK, Cloudformation or Terraform.You have designed and implemented serverless solutions leveraging virtualization and/or containerization strategies and technologies (Docker, Kubernetes, Lambda, etc.)You’re opinionated about tooling and curious about new trends and technologies in the software development world.You like to work collaboratively with developers, data scientists and UX teams to improve the quality and resiliency of the products you’re releasing.You have a background in product development, delivering solutions to business problems in a fast paced team.You have working knowledge of all aspects of product design, including data modeling, service performance and security.You have excellent verbal and written communication skills with a focus on good technical writing.', 'Our COVID Commitment: VEDA is committed to prioritizing the health, safety and emotional well being of our employees and their families. That means allowing our employees to choose to work remotely until there is a widely available vaccine.', 'Understanding of networking and network design principles.', 'You will be responsible for ensuring the security, reliability and performance of all our products, keeping cost in mind.', 'You are experienced with AWS infrastructure modeling tools, including CDK, Cloudformation or Terraform.', 'Experience working in an Agile team.', 'You will help move our software development practices forward and can help mentor others on design and best practices.', 'You like to work collaboratively with developers, data scientists and UX teams to improve the quality and resiliency of the products you’re releasing.', 'You’ll work closely with our entire team to architect and implement our growing product portfolio.', 'Ready to build the future with us? VEDA is looking for sharp-minded do-gooders who share our values:', 'Benefits offered by VEDA:', 'You are practiced in working with AWS cloud architecture, including products such RDS, S3, ECS, Lambda, DynamoDB, API Gateway and CodeDeploy.', 'Team lead or management experience.', 'We iterate quickly in a multi-account cloud architecture, with numerous data sources and models – that’s where you come in.You will lead the design and implementation of our solutions, focusing on the application first and utilizing current serverless best practices.You’ll work closely with our entire team to architect and implement our growing product portfolio.You will help move our software development practices forward and can help mentor others on design and best practices.You will be responsible for ensuring the security, reliability and performance of all our products, keeping cost in mind.You will look for opportunities to modernize our practices and offerings and help lead the team to realize your vision.', 'Openness - Actively listening, sharing and holding space for new ideas, perspectives and people', 'About You', 'Integrity- Doing the right thing, honestly and transparently.', 'Demonstrated hands on software development projects in Python or JavaScript is required. You have direct experience in software design, build, deployment, version control, configuration and testing of applications using modern best practices.', 'You will lead the design and implementation of our solutions, focusing on the application first and utilizing current serverless best practices.', 'Skills You Might Have', 'You’re opinionated about tooling and curious about new trends and technologies in the software development world.', 'A working knowledge of various different development languages.', 'All employees are required to be located within the USA.', 'Grit - Displaying passion and perseverance to achieve our goals.\xa0', 'VEDA is made up of talented professionals that are driven to do meaningful work to change healthcare from the inside out. We are also friends, parents, partners and caregivers. VEDA’s benefits reflect our values—we offer fully paid, low or no-deductible medical, dental and vision insurance for our employees and their families. We ensure that employees can take time off to recharge and have flexibility to care for themselves and their families.', '\xa0', 'We iterate quickly in a multi-account cloud architecture, with numerous data sources and models – that’s where you come in.', 'You have working knowledge of all aspects of product design, including data modeling, service performance and security.', 'We look forward to learning more about you -- apply to join the VEDA team today!', 'You have a background in product development, delivering solutions to business problems in a fast paced team.', 'You will look for opportunities to modernize our practices and offerings and help lead the team to realize your vision.', 'Experience working in highly regulated industries like finance, health care or defense.Understanding of networking and network design principles.A working knowledge of various different development languages.Experience working in an Agile team.Team lead or management experience.', 'About the Position', 'You have designed and implemented serverless solutions leveraging virtualization and/or containerization strategies and technologies (Docker, Kubernetes, Lambda, etc.)', 'VEDA helps patients get the care they need by untangling technical healthcare complexities with fresh scientific approaches and generous collaboration. Our technology reflects what our people provide: quality without ego, honesty backed by science, and warmth in an industry not known for having much heat.']

company: The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory
job_text: ['', 'Have experience with a variety of web application tools and technologies such as vue.js, REST, JAX-RS, JPA, Hibernate, Spring, etc.', 'As a Software Engineer in the Artificial Intelligence Group;', 'Special Working Conditions', 'You meet our minimum qualifications for the job if you:', 'Have experience developing mobile software.', ' You will elicit user needs and translate them into technical requirements and specifications. Furnish deliverables that meet sponsor needs and are consistent with APL quality standards, and conform to the constraints of scope, schedule, and budget for our sponsors. You will document and present papers on current research and development activities at external venues. You will communicate often and effectively with team, sponsors and JHU/APL leadership by actively participating in the APL data science, analytics and AI community. ', 'You will develop, test, and deploy software solutions for a variety of challenging projects to include analytic applications with database and GIS capabilities.', 'Have excellent interpersonal, organizational, and communication skills.', " Have 5 years of demonstrated experience in software development Have experience with full-stack Java development. Have experience developing software with languages such as C#, Python, or Groovy. Have experience programming with common AI libraries such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, pytorch, or OpenCV. Have experience with a variety of web application tools and technologies such as vue.js, REST, JAX-RS, JPA, Hibernate, Spring, etc. Have experience with NoSQL technologies such as Elasticsearch or MongoDB. Have experience with IoT technologies and protocols. Have experience with ETL solutions, enterprise integration patterns, message-oriented middleware, and hands-on experience integrating third-party devices/software into software systems. Have experience with GIS technologies including ESRI's ArcView, ArcIMS, GeoTools, GeoServer and Open Layers. Have experience developing mobile software. Have experience developing software that integrates with sensors and/or devices. Have experience with technical writing, including peer-reviewed scientific publications. ", ' Your primary responsibility will be to develop web applications and software services that tailor best practices and apply state-of-the-art tools and techniques. You will develop, test, and deploy software solutions for a variety of challenging projects to include analytic applications with database and GIS capabilities. ', 'Have ability to obtain a Secret security clearance. If selected, you will be subject to a government security clearance investigation and must meet the requirements for access to classified information. Eligibility requirements include U.S. citizenship.', 'Have a B.S. degree in computer science, computer engineering, electrical engineering or equivalent with at least one year of professional experience.', 'Have experience with technical writing, including peer-reviewed scientific publications.', 'You will communicate often and effectively with team, sponsors and JHU/APL leadership by actively participating in the APL data science, analytics and AI community.', 'Have experience developing software with languages such as C#, Python, or Groovy.', "Have experience with GIS technologies including ESRI's ArcView, ArcIMS, GeoTools, GeoServer and Open Layers.", 'Have 5 years of demonstrated experience in software development', 'You are above and beyond our minimum requirements if you:', 'Have experience with NoSQL technologies such as Elasticsearch or MongoDB.', ' Have a B.S. degree in computer science, computer engineering, electrical engineering or equivalent with at least one year of professional experience. Are highly skilled in developing software with Java. Have experience with SQL language and specific databases such as Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, or PostgreSQL. Have experience with JavaScript and a JavaScript framework such as Angular, ReactJS, or Ext.js Have excellent interpersonal, organizational, and communication skills. Have ability to obtain a Secret security clearance. If selected, you will be subject to a government security clearance investigation and must meet the requirements for access to classified information. Eligibility requirements include U.S. citizenship. ', 'Have experience with IoT technologies and protocols.', 'Your primary responsibility will be to develop web applications and software services that tailor best practices and apply state-of-the-art tools and techniques.', 'You will elicit user needs and translate them into technical requirements and specifications. Furnish deliverables that meet sponsor needs and are consistent with APL quality standards, and conform to the constraints of scope, schedule, and budget for our sponsors.', 'Have experience with SQL language and specific databases such as Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, or PostgreSQL.', ' Some travel to local sponsor sites and support for field testing may be required. ', 'Have experience developing software that integrates with sensors and/or devices.', 'Why Work at APL?', 'Have experience with full-stack Java development.', 'Have experience programming with common AI libraries such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, pytorch, or OpenCV.', 'Have experience with ETL solutions, enterprise integration patterns, message-oriented middleware, and hands-on experience integrating third-party devices/software into software systems.', 'Have experience with JavaScript and a JavaScript framework such as Angular, ReactJS, or Ext.js', 'Some travel to local sponsor sites and support for field testing may be required.', 'You will document and present papers on current research and development activities at external venues.', 'Are highly skilled in developing software with Java.']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Business Intelligence, Looker, Google Cloud
job_text: ['', 'San Francisco, CA, USA; Santa Cruz, CA, USA', 'Build prototypes as needed to direct implementation that balances constraints with business needs.', 'About the job', 'As part of the Looker Business Intelligence team, you’ll be responsible for revolutionizing the way people get the answers they need from Looker by helping the team build industry-leading business intelligence experiences. The team’s mission is to build useful, powerful, easy-to-use experiences for investigating data. You’ll work with a team of engineers by re-imagining and building new interfaces to help people find what they’re looking for, easier and faster than they can today. You’ll develop tools that build on our world-renowned modeling layer to generate deep, interactive visualizations.', 'Ability to learn and assimilate technical information quickly and make decisions based on conflicting constraints', '5 years of professional software development experience or 1 year with an advanced degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Engineering.Software development experience in Javascript, HTML and CSS.Experience with front end frameworks such as AngularJS, ReactJS, etc.Experience leading technical projects, and setting technical direction.', 'Drive progress and decision making on large, mission critical technical projects.', 'Responsibilities', 'Work with management to mentor and grow all members of the team.', 'Experience leading technical projects, and setting technical direction.', 'Collaborate closely with other Software Engineers, Product Managers, Designers, and other stakeholders across the organization.Drive progress and decision making on large, mission critical technical projects.Build prototypes as needed to direct implementation that balances constraints with business needs.Work with management to mentor and grow all members of the team.Optimize team processes to ensure the team is meeting commitments and delivering high-quality software.', 'Experience with front end frameworks such as AngularJS, ReactJS, etc.', '5 years of professional software development experience or 1 year with an advanced degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Engineering.', 'Collaborate closely with other Software Engineers, Product Managers, Designers, and other stakeholders across the organization.', 'Software development experience in Javascript, HTML and CSS.', 'Minimum qualifications:', 'Optimize team processes to ensure the team is meeting commitments and delivering high-quality software.', 'Experience building React-based production web applications.', "Google's software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another. Our products need to handle information at massive scale, and extend well beyond web search. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design and mobile; the list goes on and is growing every day. As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Google’s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.With your technical expertise you will manage project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables. You will design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and enhance software solutions.", 'Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; Santa Cruz, CA, USA', 'Preferred qualifications:', '5 years of experience as a Software Engineer in the Business Intelligence space.', '5 years of experience as a Software Engineer in the Business Intelligence space.Experience delivering critical products with business impact. Experience interfacing and integrating across multiple engineering areas and groups.Experience building React-based production web applications.Ability to learn and assimilate technical information quickly and make decisions based on conflicting constraints', 'Experience delivering critical products with business impact. Experience interfacing and integrating across multiple engineering areas and groups.', 'Looker is a unified platform that powers data experiences and delivers actionable business insights to employees at the point of decision. Looker integrates data into the daily workflows of users to allow organizations to extract value from data at web-scale.']

job_text: ['', 'Develop subsystem requirements and perform analysis on a wide variety of large and disparate datasets using complex techniques.', 'Experience in writing proposals, task plans, and research publications for peer reviewed forums.', 'Communicate results to internal customers.', "Typically requires a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related discipline with a minimum of 3 years of related experience; Master's degree in similar disciplines with a minimum of 1 year of related experience; or PhD in similar disciplines.", '.', 'Experience in interdisciplinary team leadership.', 'Develop and combine complex data analysis techniques and methods for a specific application', 'Active TS/SCI clearance is required for this position.', 'What You Will Tackle', 'Hands on experience in automation and analysis systems for robotic autonomous systems.Extensive knowledge of applicable industry and/or academic practices and standards in Software design & development and Computer Science.Experience in interdisciplinary team leadership.Experience in writing proposals, task plans, and research publications for peer reviewed forums.', 'Design and develop complete components of software tools for data analytics.', 'Apply and combine current and emerging techniques and tools in novel ways.', 'Extensive knowledge of applicable industry and/or academic practices and standards in Software design & development and Computer Science.', 'Experience in wide application of principles, theories, concepts and techniques in programming languages such as C++, C, Python, Java, and Artificial Intelligence Techniques and concepts.', "Typically requires a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related discipline with a minimum of 3 years of related experience; Master's degree in similar disciplines with a minimum of 1 year of related experience; or PhD in similar disciplines.Broad knowledge in one or more related fields of the following areas: software development, artificial intelligence, operations research, resource allocation mechanisms, quantitative modeling, machine learning, computer vision, risk models and probabilistic methods.Experience in wide application of principles, theories, concepts and techniques in programming languages such as C++, C, Python, Java, and Artificial Intelligence Techniques and concepts.Active TS/SCI clearance is required for this position.", 'Broad knowledge in one or more related fields of the following areas: software development, artificial intelligence, operations research, resource allocation mechanisms, quantitative modeling, machine learning, computer vision, risk models and probabilistic methods.', 'Hands on experience in automation and analysis systems for robotic autonomous systems.', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Develop scheduling algorithms for autonomous systems that must interpret large amounts of input state, constraint, and event data to generate actions and scheduled to achieve higher level goals.']

['', 'In this role, you will help us evolve our continuous integration (CI) system and embedded test automation, in collaboration with electrical, mechanical and software engineers. We’re eager to talk if you’re a systems thinker who is excited about strengthening team testing culture and simplifying daily work flows.', "SRAM, LLC is one of the world's largest suppliers of components to the bike industry. Established in Chicago in 1987, SRAM continues to promote cycling through its products, its advocacy, and its employees who are dedicated to improving the cycling experience. Today, SRAM employs more than 3,600+ employees, 15+ locations and 15+ countries. SRAM is proud to be an equal opportunity employer.", 'Disciplined approach to testing and quality assurance (highly preferred)', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'JOB PURPOSE', 'As part of a talented team of Electrical Engineers, Mechanical Engineers, Software Engineers and others, the Software Engineer in Test will work to deliver new and innovative products to millions of athletes and cycling enthusiasts across the world.\xa0', 'B.S. degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or equivalent.', 'Check out the following overview of a recent project, SRAM AXS:\xa0https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LEbJRmNgD8E', 'Improve the reliability and performance of our test and build processes, including our existing Python and C test framework.', 'Disciplined approach to testing and quality assurance (highly preferred)Experience with embedded hardware/software platforms (highly preferred)Great communication skills, both verbal and written (highly preferred)Proficiency with Linux and Python (highly preferred)Experience with continuous integration platforms, either as a user or maintainer (preferred)Experience in an international cross-functional team (preferred)', 'Research test automation approaches and trends. Disseminate proposed changes and best practices to coworkers.', 'Proficiency with Linux and Python (highly preferred)', 'About SRAM', 'Pro-actively collaborate with the team to improve and document development work flows related to CI and automated testing', 'RELEVANT / DESIRED EXPERIENCE', 'LOCATION', 'Experience in an international cross-functional team (preferred)', 'EDUCATION / MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS\xa0', 'Report defects, participate in debugging, and validate fixes.', 'Great communication skills, both verbal and written (highly preferred)', 'The Software Engineer in Test position is intended to work onsite in our Chicago SRAM location. Non-local candidates will be expected to relocate to the Chicago area by an agreed upon date. Due to COVID-19 we are open to negotiating a remote start date and separate relocation date, based on the selected candidate’s situation.', 'Support a safe, inclusive workplace where all team members value diversity and individual differences', '\xa0', 'Experience with embedded hardware/software platforms (highly preferred)', 'Improve the reliability and performance of our test and build processes, including our existing Python and C test framework.Pro-actively collaborate with the team to improve and document development work flows related to CI and automated testingReport defects, participate in debugging, and validate fixes.Research test automation approaches and trends. Disseminate proposed changes and best practices to coworkers.Support a safe, inclusive workplace where all team members value diversity and individual differences', 'Experience with continuous integration platforms, either as a user or maintainer (preferred)']

['', '\ufeff', 'Cisco is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, genetic information, age, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected basis. Cisco will consider for employment, on a case by case basis, qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.', 'Experience developing and implementing core network protocols (TCP, IP, DNS, DHCP, ARP)Experience building cloud-based infrastructure and services (e.g. web applications)Understanding of network security fundamentalsExperience with build systems (Yocto, OpenWRT)', 'Fluency in C or C++Experience with an object-oriented programming paradigmExperience in system design and architectureExperience with application hosting environments and containerization (Docker, LXC)Experience with IPC/RPC communication mechanisms3+ years experience in a production software engineering environmentExcellent communication (oral and written) and presentation skillsExperience developing and troubleshooting in a Linux environmentExperience working with and writing concurrent programsUnderstanding of OS fundamentals and experience working in both kernel and user-spaceGood networking foundational knowledge (LANs, routing, switching, wireless)A focused, organized approach to development, testing, and qualityScripting skills in Ruby or Python', 'Fluency in C or C++', 'Understanding of OS fundamentals and experience working in both kernel and user-space', 'Experience with an object-oriented programming paradigm', 'You are an ideal candidate if you have:', 'Experience developing and implementing core network protocols (TCP, IP, DNS, DHCP, ARP)', 'Experience with application hosting environments and containerization (Docker, LXC)', 'Experience with IPC/RPC communication mechanisms', 'Experience with build systems (Yocto, OpenWRT)', 'Experience building cloud-based infrastructure and services (e.g. web applications)', 'Good networking foundational knowledge (LANs, routing, switching, wireless)', 'Meraki Software Engineers breathe life into our cloud-managed network-attached devices, which include switches, routers, wireless access, and security cameras. We use real-time telemetry from thousands of deployed networks spanning the globe to continuously improve the performance and stability of our products. We are passionate about building real products that our customers love.', 'Experience working with and writing concurrent programs', 'Experience in system design and architecture', '3+ years experience in a production software engineering environment', 'Excellent communication (oral and written) and presentation skills', 'As a Senior Systems Software Engineer, this person will be developing and supporting software that breathes life into our MS product line. Initially, this role will focus on delivering fixes for regressions, improving debuggability, and eliminating technical debt and code smells. All of which are key to accelerating the release of bringing up new products to customers. As you mature in your knowledge of our codebase, you will be responsible for improving and re-architecting existing components and subsystems, as well as bringing up new products and features to support the growth of MS, both in terms of functionality, simplicity, scalability, and availability. Our projects are driven by technological innovation and developer creativity in addition to market demands, giving you the structure and freedom to pursue projects you are most passionate about. In this role, you will have the opportunity to work across teams to craft systems that enable us to tackle complex problems for our customers. With millions of people using Meraki products around the world, your work will have a significant impact from the day it is deployed.', '\xa0', 'A focused, organized approach to development, testing, and quality', 'Bonus points for:', 'Experience developing and troubleshooting in a Linux environment', 'Scripting skills in Ruby or Python', 'At Cisco Meraki, we’re challenging the status quo with the power of diversity, inclusion, and collaboration. When we connect different perspectives, we can imagine new possibilities, inspire innovation, and release the full potential of our people. We’re building an employee experience that includes appreciation, belonging, growth, and purpose for everyone.', 'Understanding of network security fundamentals']

['', 'Your primary responsibility will be the handling of customer projects on strategic and operational level.', 'Squirro takes advantage of its ability to source leads, recommend the next best action in an automated way, derive customer-related and other insights from various data sources.', 'Experience as a DevOps Engineer or equivalent software-engineering role.', 'Phone:\xa0+41 44 586 98 98', 'If a partner is involved you will be responsible for guidance, support and review of the project and the partners work.', 'Squirro is a Swiss startup, based in Zurich and with offices in London, New York, Munich, and Singapore.Squirro works with global data-driven organizations, predominately with the world’s leading banks, chemistry-, biology-, insurance-, and law-enforcement organizations and other big and mid-size commercial businesses.Squirro takes advantage of its ability to source leads, recommend the next best action in an automated way, derive customer-related and other insights from various data sources.', 'Preferred experiences', 'Worked with unstructured data on a previous project or role.', 'Other: Atlassian (JIRA, Confluence).', 'Frontend components – Backbone.js, Underscore.js.', 'Your primary responsibility will be the handling of customer projects on strategic and operational level.The customer projects will cover on the technical level the setup, deployment, data loading, data transformation, dashboarding and integration. Our team is implementing the Squirro platform, an unstructured data discovery and analysis platform for our customers.', 'Qualifications', 'Squirro is a Swiss startup, based in Zurich and with offices in London, New York, Munich, and Singapore.', '1+ year at technical consulting experience and strong business acumen / communication skills.1+ years in a client-facing role that involves being a point-of-contact for technical and non-technical users.Experience with Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning.Worked with unstructured data on a previous project or role.Familiar with time series analysis and anomaly detection algorithms.Ability to communicate complex technical concepts to various audience levels, and support sales personnel at customer sites with attention to details and organizational skills.Experience as a DevOps Engineer or equivalent software-engineering role.', 'At least two years of work experience.', '1+ year at technical consulting experience and strong business acumen / communication skills.', 'Our Tools', 'Core software – Python, JavaScript, CentOS.Data storage – ElasticSearch, MySQL, Redis.Web components – Nginx, Flask.Frontend components – Backbone.js, Underscore.js.Other: Atlassian (JIRA, Confluence).', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or related technical field.', 'The customer projects will cover on the technical level the setup, deployment, data loading, data transformation, dashboarding and integration. On the business level your responsibilities will cover the documentation, handling of various stakeholders and guidance on future business requirements.', 'Strong track record in software systems design and implementation.', 'Strong programming experience in Python.', 'Good communication skills with fluency in English. ['', 'Skills/Requirements:•Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or Engineering; Master’s degree a plus.', '•Interest in Cloud Engineering and its impact on greater business practices.', '•Excellent communication and organizational skills, and the ability to stay focused on completing tasks and meeting goals within a busy workspace.', '•Strong experience with automation tools including Terraform and Ansible.', 'Responsibilities:•Working in tandem with our engineering team to identify and implement the most optimal cloud-based solutions for the company.', '•Orchestrating and automating cloud-based platforms throughout the company.', '•Using your extensive knowledge of APIs to design RESTful services, and integrate them with existing data providers, using JSON or XML as needed.', '•Managing cloud environments in accordance with company security and compliance guidelines.', '•Experience with SOA applications and cloud-based services, preferably MS Azure.', '•Three to five years’ experience in a Cloud Engineer role or related position.', '•Employing exceptional problem-solving skills, with the ability to see and solve issues before they snowball into problems.', '•Strong experience with networking and internet protocols, including TCP/IP, DNS, SMTP, HTTP and distributed networks.', '•Deploying and debugging cloud services as needed in accordance with best practices throughout the development lifecycle.', '•Strong experience with configuration management tools including puppet.', '•Five years’ experience in developing software using languages such as Golang, Python, and C/C++.', '•Knowledge of web services, API, REST and RPC.', '•Database experience, including knowledge of SQL and NoSQL, and related data stores such as Postgres.', '•Planning, designing and developing cloud-based infrastructure and supporting services.', '•Develop and support best practices for larger Cloud Engineer team.', '•Experience with container technologies (docker/rkt). Experience with container orchestration, preferably Kubernetes a plus.', '•Educating teams on the implementation of new cloud-based services, providing associated training as required.', "Marshwinds International, Inc. is collaboratng with our direct client a Digital Adverting and Analytics company to hire a Senior Cloud Engineer. This is a full time opportunity that offers a competitive salary, bonus, and excellent health benefits, PTO, Retirement Plan,Stock Options and 401K. Our client doesn't provide sponsorship for this opportunity. Only candidates able to work in the US without sponsorship will be considered.\xa0", '•Building and designing services in the cloud, along with implementing the set-up of geographically redundant services.', 'For immediate consideration please email your updated resume and salary requirements to Senior Technical Recruiter Michele McDonald to her email address at mmcdonald@marshwinds.net', '•Certification as a Cloud Solutions Architect, Cloud Security Certification, and/or OpenStack Administrator Certification a plus. (Other cloud-related certifications also a plus.)']

job_title: Software Engineer for Autonomous Driving R&D
job_text: ['', ' Experience working with, modifying, and creating advanced algorithms ', '2+ years Software Engineering or related work experience.', '2+ years experience with Programming Language such as C, C++, Java, Python, etc.', ' Experience with autonomous systems in one or more of the following areas: motion planning, decision-making, tracking and prediction, vehicle control systems, perception, localization, estimation, and machine learning ', 'Overview', ' Extensive experience working with autonomous driving systems ', ' Design and implement motion planning algorithms for full self-driving vehicles  Generate innovative ideas to address technical challenges in trajectory generation, planning under uncertainty, and decision-making for autonomous driving  Analyze data from simulation and real-world testing  Work closely and build relationships with experts in robotics, AI, and machine learning ', ' Experience programming in C++ and Python ', ' Automation frameworks and high-fidelity simulations of dynamic systems in virtual worlds ', ' MS or Doctorate in Computer Science, Robotics, or related field ', 'Company:', ' Analyze data from simulation and real-world testing ', ' Experience with large-scale software deployment ', "Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field.", ' Research experience with probabilistic planning and prediction, advanced vehicle controls, multi-modal sensor fusion, or deep learning for robotics ', "Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field.2+ years Software Engineering or related work experience.2+ years experience with Programming Language such as C, C++, Java, Python, etc.", ' Work closely and build relationships with experts in robotics, AI, and machine learning ', 'Role', 'Job Area:', ' Robust software design for safety-critical systems ', ' EEO Employer: Qualcomm is an equal opportunity employer; all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, Veteran status, or any other protected classification.', 'Applicants', ' Generate innovative ideas to address technical challenges in trajectory generation, planning under uncertainty, and decision-making for autonomous driving ', ' Design and implement motion planning algorithms for full self-driving vehicles ', ' Experience with autonomous systems in one or more of the following areas: motion planning, decision-making, tracking and prediction, vehicle control systems, perception, localization, estimation, and machine learning  Experience working with, modifying, and creating advanced algorithms  Experience programming in C++ and Python  MS or Doctorate in Computer Science, Robotics, or related field  Extensive experience working with autonomous driving systems  Robust software design for safety-critical systems  Experience with large-scale software deployment  Automation frameworks and high-fidelity simulations of dynamic systems in virtual worlds  Research experience with probabilistic planning and prediction, advanced vehicle controls, multi-modal sensor fusion, or deep learning for robotics ', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'To all Staffing and Recruiting Agencies', 'Job Overview:', 'Preferred Qualifications']

['', 'Competitive salary and excellent growth opportunities.\xa0\xa0', 'Things that we care about (requirements)', 'For the position of Staff Engineer you will be asked to deliver solutions for a complex platform that helps customers manage their risk.\xa0You will be expected to drive impact by solving these complex problems and act as a lead for design and architecture.\xa0You will report to an engineering manager but will lead and mentor other engineers.\xa0This role will involve both frontend and backend work and you will work on one of the biggest Ruby repositories in the business.\xa0', '7 + years years Ruby on Rails,Python, C++ or Java', 'Opportunity to work on one of the biggest repositories for RoR’s.\xa0Work directly with company leadership on building something from the ground up.\xa0A diverse dynamic and inclusive environment that doesn’t tolerate any discrimination.Competitive health plans, flexible time off, volunteer days, and employee enrichment by continuous learning opportunities and programs.\xa0Company paid conferences and meetups.\xa0Competitive salary and excellent growth opportunities.\xa0\xa0', 'Things that we don’t care about', "It's not important where you are located, but if you are interested in going into an office the opportunity is there. We don’t care what you do in your free time, your gender, age, race, or sexual preference doesn’t matter.", 'Opportunity to work on one of the biggest repositories for RoR’s.\xa0', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field or work experience", 'Experience designing and building software in a Service Oriented Architecture', 'A diverse dynamic and inclusive environment that doesn’t tolerate any discrimination.', 'Competitive health plans, flexible time off, volunteer days, and employee enrichment by continuous learning opportunities and programs.\xa0', 'Pre IPO startup that has proven success with over 1 million plus users.\xa0The company is already very profitable and their headquarters are located right on the water in beautiful central California. This position has the option to be fully remote, or be based in the headquarters, Austin,TX or Canada.\xa0', 'Things you probably care about', 'An interest on building new platforms and solutions and a keen desire to innovate\xa0', 'Experience with documenting problems and aligning your team to solve these problems', 'Company paid conferences and meetups.\xa0', 'You will make a difference by', 'Experience with PostgreSQL and React', 'The techstack is Ruby / Rails / Postgres, with a few microservices in Rust and Elixir, and they are one of the most advanced Ruby on Rails shops around.\xa0The biggest tech challenges they are facing are big data, complex filing systems, live finance, and scalability.\xa0\xa0', 'About the Company', 'Work directly with company leadership on building something from the ground up.\xa0', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field or work experience7 + years years Ruby on Rails,Python, C++ or JavaExperience with PostgreSQL and ReactExperience designing and building software in a Service Oriented ArchitectureExperience with documenting problems and aligning your team to solve these problemsAn interest on building new platforms and solutions and a keen desire to innovate\xa0"]

', 'Works in a complex environment on multiple projects and initiatives with competing timelines to drive delivery of solutions that bring value to the business.', 'Influences and educates customers by prototyping, performing demos, and promoting platform capabilities to the business.', 'Excellent process orientation, planning, organizational, and problem-solving skills with the demonstrated ability to design effective business solutions.', '3+ years’ experience leading a development team.', 'Gathers and analyzes requirements; designs, develops, tests, and maintains high-quality business solutions.', 'Participates in Agile ceremonies, such as daily stand-ups, iteration planning, demos, retrospectives, program increment planning, etc.', 'Experience developing custom workflows, creating plug-ins, and migrating/integrating data via SSIS, web services (SOAP/REST), and APIs.', 'Creates and maintains documentation for platform governance, architecture, and coding standards.', 'Performs peer reviews to ensure adherence to standards and best practices.', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Preferred Qualifications']

job_title: Software Engineer II – Robotic Process Automation (RPA)
job_text: ['', 'If you’re excited about joining the DSG team, we’d love to meet you.', 'Apply today!', 'Work with open source tools to build new technologies', 'Work in a silo', 'As an Engineer at DICK’s you will:', 'Bring at least 2 years of experience to the table', 'At DICK’s You Won’t', 'Lastly, here’s some stuff that won’t be part of your day-to-day.', 'As an RPA Engineer, a firm background with .NET development is also a must. Additionally, strong knowledge of relational databases (Oracle, MS SQL Server, etc) is required. Experience with other languages, frameworks, or tools is a plus!', 'Experience', 'Find yourself stuck in a boring cube', 'Our automation ecosystem will be built on the UiPath platform. Experience with UiPath or similar platforms (Blue Prism, Automation Anywhere, etc) is a must.', 'Review and discuss code with engineering peers and leaders to understand best practices and optimal design patterns', ' Willingness to speak up and share your opinions and insights. Your experience will be invaluable as we build our RPA Center of Excellence! Our automation ecosystem will be built on the UiPath platform. Experience with UiPath or similar platforms (Blue Prism, Automation Anywhere, etc) is a must. Past experience implementing Multi-Bot architectures within UiPath is highly desired.  As an RPA Engineer, a firm background with .NET development is also a must. Additionally, strong knowledge of relational databases (Oracle, MS SQL Server, etc) is required. Experience with other languages, frameworks, or tools is a plus! Experience automating Microsoft Outlook and Excel is not required but is highly desired. Additionally, experience with OCR technologies will be a major plus as well. A well-rounded development background is strongly desired. Are you familiar with writing or consuming APIs, writing code libraries, or other automation tools and approaches? Great! ', 'Pay to park or be stuck in a corporate high-rise', 'A well-rounded development background is strongly desired. ['', '  5+ years data quality assurance experience, QA methodologies, tools and processes such as (the following are just examples, experience in each of these areas is not required):  Systems requirements analysis, requirements documentation, business process modeling/design, user acceptance testing, quality assurance, business data management, logical data modeling, systems integration, test automation, defect tracking     2+ years experience in data-related projects such as (the following are just examples, experience in each of these areas is not required):  Datacenter migrations, projects connecting systems together, for example, getting customer relationship data in and out of Salesforce, projects connecting systems and getting them talking to each other, getting business intelligence systems up and running, data movement via API, data migration from onsite to offsite public cloud, extract/transform/load (“ETL”) projects, data lake projects, data mart projects, creating data warehouses, getting new data into operational data stores, data cleansing projects, data cubes, migrating an accounting team off Excel spreadsheets to a new payroll vendor     2+ years of writing SQL with Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL or similar   Nice to have (but not required):  Experience coding in any language e.g. PHP, Python, C#, iOS, Ruby, Java, HTML, JavaScript, R, SAS, etc   Experience with ETL tools (Talend, Informatica, Pentaho, Alteryx, etc.), data warehouses and data cubes   Experience with performance and/or security testing    ', ' Estimates, prioritizes, plans and coordinate testing activities ', ' Reviews requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback ', ' Identifies, record, document thoroughly and track data bugs ', ' Tracks quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts. ['', '\ufeff', 'Proven, fast-growing marketplace business with millions of dollars in annual revenue\xa0', 'Have something to teach us', 'Here are some reasons to join us:\xa0', 'Seattle, Washington', 'Company Description:', 'Take responsibility for their work\xa0', 'A collaborative team culture that encourages pairing, iteration, and impact\xa0', 'Responsibilities:\xa0', 'Job Description:\xa0', "Novel vision to transform kids' education through remote teaching with live video chat\xa0", 'We look for candidates who:\xa0', 'We are driving innovation in education by providing children with a digital curriculum, tailored to individual interests, in order to motivate and inspire them to enjoy learning.', 'Have been programming professionally and challenging themselves for at least 2 years (remote work will be considered for candidates with at least 6-7 years of experience)\xa0', 'Funded by top education and marketplace investors, Reach Capital and Union Square Ventures.', 'Care about learning and education\xa0', 'You will assist us with our upcoming projects, including data-driven recommendations, measuring teacher quality and learner engagement, learner profiles, integrated messaging, assignments, learning paths, growth experiments, better search, and more while working primarily with JavaScript (React, GraphQL/Apollo, and Node/Express, PostgreSQL).', "We are an effective team of senior engineers, getting a lot done by staying focused on the work that matters. We're building up a complex product for a highly engaged audience.\xa0", 'Senior Full Stack Engineer', 'Required Skills: JavaScript, React, GraphQL, Apollo, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, Front End', 'Lots of opportunities to make an impact by building large features end-to-end\xa0', 'Consumer product with fast iteration cycles means you can have a big impact in a short time\xa0', 'One of our clients is looking to hire a "Senior Full Stack Engineer" in Seattle, Washington. Please find the job details below-', 'Experienced team from Airbnb, Square, Amazon, Google, Udemy and Clever\xa0', 'Balance big-picture perspective with attention to detail\xa0', 'Have JavaScript experience (React, GraphQL/Apollo, and Node/Express, PostgreSQL)\xa0', 'Communicate clearly, both when speaking and in writing\xa0']

['', 'This role is based in our new state-of-the-art innovation center, located in Lexington, MA.', 'As part of our dedication to the diversity of our staff, Intelon Optics, Inc. is committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race, color, national origin, ethnicity, gender, protected veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion.', 'Understanding of Windows OS aspects (services, processes, Windows IoT, applications installation and configuration, kiosk mode, etc.)', 'Please email team@intelon.com with your resume and a cover letter attached.', 'To Apply', 'The above assumes in-deep understanding and experience with inter-process interaction, synchronization, multithreading, transactions, performance, implementation of both asynchronous and real-time calls and operations; strong, recent, hands-on, practical C++ programming skills.', 'Contribute to the full software DevOps cycle, including requirements gathering, architecture, design, coding, unit testing, deployment, maintenance, writing design documentation, etc.', 'This role offers continuous exposure to the latest developments in an exciting field poised for growth, as well as the wide spectrum of programming languages, cutting edge technologies, and people who are passionate about the future of technology in healthcare.', 'Collaborate with team members across engineering disciplines including mechanical engineering, electronics, clinical and regulatory affairs, and technical and scientific consultants.', 'Release engineering, s/w versioning, deployment, and maintenanceUnderstanding of Windows OS aspects (services, processes, Windows IoT, applications installation and configuration, kiosk mode, etc.)Full stack Java (version 11 and up), Java FX, Spring/Spring Boot, Hibernate, Liquibase, TCP/IP, Jaxon/JAXB data serialization.  C# programming skillsExperience in SaaS, big data analysis, AI, Elastic Search', 'Use TCP and other protocols for inter-process communications.', 'The software tool chain includes: C++ as a primary programming language (with Visual Studio as IDE) SQL (SQLite), Python. OOP skills, proper use and understanding of design patterns, ability to document design solutions, including UML are a must.', 'Apply your software development skills to the entire product development lifecycle of intelligent, automated medical devices.', 'Full stack Java (version 11 and up), Java FX, Spring/Spring Boot, Hibernate, Liquibase, TCP/IP, Jaxon/JAXB data serialization.  C# programming skills', 'Additional skills in the following are a plus:', 'Apply your software development skills to the entire product development lifecycle of intelligent, automated medical devices.Develop software interfaces to devices comprising the medical instruments designed by Intelon Optics using 3d party drivers and API’s.Integrate the devices into overall instrument operational workflow using USB, COM ports and other connectivity and control methods and techniques.Use TCP and other protocols for inter-process communications.Apply image and video processing and rendering techniques for comprehensive instrument data visualization, as well as mathematical data processing algorithms.The above assumes in-deep understanding and experience with inter-process interaction, synchronization, multithreading, transactions, performance, implementation of both asynchronous and real-time calls and operations; strong, recent, hands-on, practical C++ programming skills.Contribute to the full software DevOps cycle, including requirements gathering, architecture, design, coding, unit testing, deployment, maintenance, writing design documentation, etc.Collaborate with team members across engineering disciplines including mechanical engineering, electronics, clinical and regulatory affairs, and technical and scientific consultants.Participate in all stages and workflows of the Agile development cycle.', 'Benefits', 'Responsibilities', 'Integrate the devices into overall instrument operational workflow using USB, COM ports and other connectivity and control methods and techniques.', 'Job Description', 'Develop software interfaces to devices comprising the medical instruments designed by Intelon Optics using 3d party drivers and API’s.', 'We are looking for someone who is adaptable, self-motivated, and able to work under pressure. We will expect you to be able to work collaboratively as part of a team and have the strong initiative and drive to work independently. You should have excellent self-organization, communication, and presentation skills.', 'Participate in all stages and workflows of the Agile development cycle.', 'Requirements', 'Apply image and video processing and rendering techniques for comprehensive instrument data visualization, as well as mathematical data processing algorithms.', '\xa0', 'Competitive salary and benefits with company incentive plan.', 'Our Agile development process implies deep understanding of such concepts as Test Driven Development, Continuous Integration, as well as practical skills with Dev Ops tools such as: JIRA, Git, Bitbucket, Bamboo, SonarQube or equivalent.', 'Release engineering, s/w versioning, deployment, and maintenance', 'Experience in SaaS, big data analysis, AI, Elastic Search', 'Intelon Optics is a rapidly expanding world class technology and innovation company.', 'This position offers an opportunity to contribute to the Medical Technology business and help shaping the future of intelligent medical devices for ophthalmology. If you are excited about solving complex, multivariate technical and systems challenges in the medical domain, and passionate about developing modern, robust, safety-critical software that serves a meaningful purpose, then this role could be for you. You will work as a member of our software development team and participate in creation of innovative optical products and technologies.', 'To meet the demanding requirements of this role you will have an excellent undergraduate degree in a relevant engineering field (e.g., Electrical or Computer Engineering or Computer Science); an advanced degree (Master’s or Ph.D.) in a related field is a plus. You will have greater than 5 years of experience in hands-on software development for complex, multi-disciplinary products. Prior experience with device development in the medical (or other regulated) environment is preferred.']

['', 'The customer facing app team is currently ~4 eng, but we’re not keeping hard team boundaries, and total technical staff is ~~20. Other teams work on physical & ag science, data science, hardware eng, our CV image processing pipeline, and internal flight planning and GIS tools.\xa0You’ll also be working with talented designers, product managers, and help iterate prototype and ideas in conjunction with agronomists and farmers (both internal and with external customers).', 'lead dev for our primary customer facing webapp', 'geospatial\xa0', 'The App:', 'VueJS\xa0+ MapboxGL JS frontend, Django Rest Framework + PostGIS backend.', 'Team Structure and Teammates', 'Customers use the app to access maps, imagery, visualizations, and other information about their field and plant’s health, and order flights.Mobile-first, and\xa0geospatial\xa0data heavy.\xa0Codebase is clean, terse, DRY & tested.VueJS\xa0+ MapboxGL JS frontend, Django Rest Framework + PostGIS backend.', 'Us', 'You', 'You: skilled hacker, strong UX, kind, good at getting 80/20 type wins, interested in improving the resource efficiency of agriculture, interested in maps OSGeo and data visualization, ready for a technical leadership position and most of all, motivated to make the app better for customers on things both big and small…. i.e. we’re looking for somebody who wants to take serious ownership of the app and do even more cool things with it!', 'More About Ceres', 'Codebase is clean, terse, DRY & tested.', 'Customers use the app to access maps, imagery, visualizations, and other information about their field and plant’s health, and order flights.', 'VueJS', 'Mobile-first, and\xa0geospatial\xa0data heavy.\xa0', 'Us: Ceres builds multispectral imaging hardware, straps it to planes, and flies it over major agricultural regions like the Central Valley. Our science and eng lets us give farmers important information about their fields, rows, and even individual plants: e.g. are they stressed out? Are they being watered evenly? Were they overwatered?', 'Ceres Imaging is a venture-backed agriculture technology company with a mission to drastically reduce farming’s environmental footprint while increasing farmer profitability. Founded out of Stanford in 2013, Ceres Imaging has grown into the market leader in aerial imagery and analytics for agriculture, and was recently cited by Fast Company as one of the 7 leading technologies making global farming smarter and more productive. The 90-person Ceres Imaging team is defined by a passion for science and agriculture, the belief that diverse companies are better companies, and a shared desire to help solve major environmental issues at a global scale.', 'VueJS and other hackers, we’re looking for a UX-savvy software engineer to\xa0lead dev for our primary customer facing webapp. We’re looking for the type of engineer who is good at saying: “if we did this instead, it would solve the same customer problem, but this way, the code is way simpler and cleaner”.']

The company supports these implementations and applications with professional services that include pipeline risk analysis, data conversion, data migration and consulting.', '', job_text: ['• Able to work quickly and under tight delivery deadlines with focus on details', '• PowerBI experience', '• Epic Module Certified', 'Sr Data Warehouse Analyst', '• Ability to manage multiple efforts concurrently', 'Minnesota', '• Master’s degree in Computer Science, MIS, Data Engineering or another relevant field', '• Lead the implementation of data strategies by analyzing and translating business needs into long-term solution data models that reduce data redundancy, streamline data movements, and improve enterprise information management.', '• Ability to Create lifecycle documents, including Business Workflow Diagrams, Business Use Cases, User Stories, User Interface Design Documents in the documentation of functional requirements, workflows and solutions.', '• Strong problem-solving skills', '• Ability to establish and maintain positive and effective work relationships with management, coworkers, and business users', 'Required', 'Experience', 'Location:\xa0\xa0Remote for now/\xa0Minnesota', '• 3 years’ experience reporting & analyzing performance & data visualization', '• Write SQL queries that clean, join, and extract data from our data warehouse to put together various types of analysis', '• Demonstrated ability to produce high quality deliverables', '• Proficient with Office products (Excel, PowerPoint, Word, Visio)', '• 5 years’ experience SQL programming skills', '• Strong knowledge of related emerging technologies and tools', '• License/Certification/Registration', '• Excellent verbal and written communication skills', '• Mentors peers and junior members of the Information Management team', '• Certified Data Engineer or Data Professional', '• 3 years’ experience with Clarity and Caboodle datasets', 'Duration: Long Term', '• 3 years’ experience with ETL programming and BI Reporting', '• Possesses strong business acumen, with ability to assist in development of business requirements definitions', '• Gathers, analyzes and develops, and refines requirements and technical specifications by acting as a liaison between technical and business departments in developing data marts, data models, and ETL assets.', 'Location:\xa0\xa0Remote for now/', 'Education', 'Preferred', 'Role: Business Systems Analyst 2 (Sr Data Warehouse Analyst)', 'Job Description:', '• 5 years’ experience in Data Warehousing', '• Documents data elements, relationships, data flow, dependencies and their related interfaces', '• Effective collaboration of tasks across the business and technical teams', '\xa0', '• Experience with Unified Medical Language System (UMLS)', '• Strong organizational and time management skills', 'The Sr Data Warehouse Analyst will be a technical leader on the data & analytics technology team. This position will be responsible for end-to-end data solutions, including business analysis, data analysis, SQL design and development, ETL requirements and design, unit testing, assisting users with UAT, and technical documentation. Must have the ability to understand business processes and their relationship with the data model and identify required ETL based on business process changes.', '• Performs Unit testing and resolves defects', '• 5 years’ experience evaluating business requirements and translating them into a functional design', '• Experience with OMOP common data models and standardization', '• Prior to coding the extract or ETL, analyzes data to determine data discrepancies, anomalies and outliers', '• Understands and analyzes business processes, and how they affect and integrate with the data model and ETL', '• Interface with key customers from all functional areas', '• Proven and recent experience of implementing solutions from requirements gathering and process design to functional production deployment', '• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, MIS, Data Engineering or another relevant field or equivalent combination of experience and education']

["As an Environmental Data Scientist, you will work evaluate and improve the company's processes and products. You will collaborate with a multi-disciplinary team of engineers on a wide range of problems to develop advanced data solutions for the Oil and Gas and Renewable Natural Gas industries. This position will bring analytical rigor and statistical methods to the challenges of developing data products, visualizations, reports, and solving the problems facing our customers. In this role, you will combine a broad set of technical knowledge to develop automated methods that will evaluate, analyze, and report customer data that results in the quantification and attribution of methane (or other trace-gas) emission sources in relevant real-time.", '', 'BS degree in a quantitative discipline (e.g. statistics, quantitative geography, meteorology, operations research, bioinformatics, computational biology, computer science, mathematics, physics).Experience with atmospheric dispersion models and analytical approaches to solving and applying in practiceExperience or coursework in the areas of Meteorology, Weather Forecasting and/or Fluid DynamicsExperience with statistical software (e.g. Python, MATLAB, Octave, pandas, R, Julia).2 - 4 years of relevant work experience (e.g. as a statistician / computational biologist / bioinformatician / data scientist), including expertise and experience with statistical data analysis such as linear models, multivariate analysis, stochastic models, sampling methods.', 'Demonstrated effective written and verbal communication skills.', "Develop a comprehensive understanding of the company's data structures & metrics and identify improvements and changes for data system development and enhancement.", 'Make effective presentations of findings through visual displays of quantitative information. ', 'BS degree in a quantitative discipline (e.g. statistics, quantitative geography, meteorology, operations research, bioinformatics, computational biology, computer science, mathematics, physics).', 'Experience or coursework in the areas of Meteorology, Weather Forecasting and/or Fluid Dynamics', 'Experience with processing geo-referenced trace-gas analyzer data (e.g., Picarro, Aeris, LGR, Li-COR, etc.)', 'Conduct end-to-end analyses that include data gathering, requirements specification, processing, analysis, ongoing deliverables, and presentations.', '2 - 4 years of relevant work experience (e.g. as a statistician / computational biologist / bioinformatician / data scientist), including expertise and experience with statistical data analysis such as linear models, multivariate analysis, stochastic models, sampling methods.', 'MS degree in a quantitative discipline as listed in Minimum Qualifications.', 'Work with the team to perform statistical analyses on surveyed data, design experiments, quantify system performance, and utilize AI/ML to create predictive models', 'Experience with atmospheric dispersion models and analytical approaches to solving and applying in practice', "Work with complex environmental data sets. Solve interesting and challenging, scientific analysis problems, applying advanced analytical methods. Conduct end-to-end analyses that include data gathering, requirements specification, processing, analysis, ongoing deliverables, and presentations.Test and implement analysis pipelines iteratively to provide insights at scale. Develop a comprehensive understanding of the company's data structures & metrics and identify improvements and changes for data system development and enhancement.Work closely with engineers to identify opportunities for, design, and assess improvements to  products.Work with the team to perform statistical analyses on surveyed data, design experiments, quantify system performance, and utilize AI/ML to create predictive modelsMake effective presentations of findings through visual displays of quantitative information. R&D analysis, forecasting, and optimization methods to improve the quality of user facing products.", 'Experience with GIS software (e.g. ArcGIS, QGIS, OpenLayers API, Google Maps API).', 'Experience with statistical software (e.g. Python, MATLAB, Octave, pandas, R, Julia).', 'Demonstrated skills in selecting the right statistical tools given a data analysis problem.', 'Work closely with engineers to identify opportunities for, design, and assess improvements to  products.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Minimum qualifications:', 'R&D analysis, forecasting, and optimization methods to improve the quality of user facing products.', 'Additional qualifications:', 'Experience translating analysis results into engineering recommendations.', 'MS degree in a quantitative discipline as listed in Minimum Qualifications.Experience with GIS software (e.g. ArcGIS, QGIS, OpenLayers API, Google Maps API).Experience translating analysis results into engineering recommendations.Experience with processing geo-referenced trace-gas analyzer data (e.g., Picarro, Aeris, LGR, Li-COR, etc.)Demonstrated skills in selecting the right statistical tools given a data analysis problem.Demonstrated effective written and verbal communication skills.', 'Work with complex environmental data sets. Solve interesting and challenging, scientific analysis problems, applying advanced analytical methods. ', 'Test and implement analysis pipelines iteratively to provide insights at scale. ']

Software engineer in Ads Measurement team will be responsible for creating insights that allow our advertisers to optimize their marketing spend, as well as providing realtime signals necessary to run our ads eco system at scale.", "Define data requirements in collaboration with digital, marketing, and external teams.Work closely with our product managers and data analysts to build state of the art Ads measurement solution.Design, Manage and Orchestrate solutions for Attribution, Measurement and Optimization - Online ConversionAttribution, Brand Lift, Multi-channel attribution, Incremental sales lift.Build and improve the machine learning models for ads measurement within Liveramp’s Analytics workbench.Develop models for user matching and conversion attributions.Develop new techniques to mine the offsite signals to drive ads performance, e.g., retargetingWork on large scale data systems, backend services, and product integrationAnalyze/understand defined segments, customer behavior, and customer journeys to inform audience segmentation strategy.Flexibility and ability to work collaboratively within matrices, 'virtual' and flat environments.", '2+ years-experience with hardcore statistical modeling, predictive modeling', 'Albertsons Companies is one of the largest food and drug retailers with 2,300+ stores. ['', 'The Lead Software Engineer is a key leadership and process management role in the company overall.\xa0\xa0', 'We are constantly enhancing the product to best serve current and prospective customers.\xa0This includes adding functionality to surpass entrenched competitors, stay ahead of newer ones, and meet the needs of a growing number of rental business types.\xa0The Lead Software Engineer leads the developers and testers who work on the product.\xa0\xa0', '- Oversee the work of the QA team that supports the development and monitoring of a quality product', 'The Lead Software Engineer manages the development and QA for our leading SaaS product.', 'Lead Software Engineer Role:', '- Experience (3+ years) with team management', '- Manage our team of full stack software engineers, including task planning, code reviews, and providing mentorship', '- A great attitude and work ethic', '- Work with the Product Director to plan sprints and ensure that they are done promptly and at a high quality level', '- Oversee the development of the product, written in Ruby on Rails and React', 'There are tens of thousands of businesses in the US that provide event, tool, audiovisual, and recreation rentals. This fragmented $722 billion global industry has not yet adopted modern systems and instead relies on pen & paper or cobbles together dated technology solutions. We’re building a solution that modernizes and dramatically improves the rental process for both businesses and their customers.', 'Requirements:', 'Responsibilities:', '- Oversee and manage deployment process', '\xa0', '- Strong development experience with Ruby on Rails (5+ years)\xa0and React (3+ years)\xa0', '- Solution oriented, self starter, and team player', 'TapGoods is an exciting, fast-growing start-up that is revolutionizing how rental companies optimize and grow their businesses. We’re working to make it easy to rent.', '- Expertise in quickly adapting based on data and insights', '- Success working on an Agile environment, preferably in a SaaS company']

['', 'You have a product-focused mindset. ', 'We have dozens of individual, mission-focused teams working across a wide spectrum of technological challenges. You will have the opportunity, depending on your interests and aptitude, to work on large-scale distributed systems coordinating thousands of servers in cloud and physical data centers around the world, petabyte-scale data challenges, machine learning, advanced visualizations, and interactive user interfaces – to name a few.', 'You are a creative thinker, ', 'You work with confidence and without ego.Our engineers have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates. ', 'You are a broadly skilled engineer , accustomed to developing web services. You have experience building always-on systems, working across a variety of technologies and service layers.
