job_title: Software Engineer II - SQL  Server ETL Specialist
job_text: ['Run and manage complex Production ETL processesSupport existing Production ETL processesWork with the project team and/or end users to gather and translate requirements into technical specifications where appropriateDocument existing business data flow processesImplement SQL Server Integrated Services packages to process business data using existing business rulesDevelop new systems by following established SDLC processes and procedures with limited or no supervision.', "1+ years of development experience with either SSIS or related OLTP ETL software. 1+ years of C#, .Net, or Java development experience.1+ years hands-on development experience with SQL Server or other Windows Relational Database Management System.Ability to write and troubleshoot T-SQL scripts and stored proceduresFamiliarity with importing/exporting data to/from a database environment.Demonstrate an ability to work in a team environment.Familiarity with the Automotive industry would be a preference, though not a requirement.Working toward or completed Bachelor's Degree in computer related field or 2 years professional experience in a computer support or help desk position.", 'Perform review of Production jobs history for errors. Identify outages/errors. Address and resolve errors where appropriate.', 'Be Part of Something Bigger', 'The chosen candidate will be responsible for assisting in the day-to-day responsibilities within the ETL group, which include:', 'Assist the ETL group in developing solutions for data archival and delivery, supporting both internal and external customers. Perform review of Production jobs history for errors. Identify outages/errors. Address and resolve errors where appropriate.Review and enhance department documentation on existing processes both to enhance training and disperse information on processes as changes are made. Occasionally attend new project meetings where requirements are obtained.Develop new systems by following established SDLC processes and procedures with limited or no supervision.', '1+ years of development experience with either SSIS or related OLTP ETL software. ', 'Document existing business data flow processes', 'Power the PossibilitiesThe CDK Global technology team is looking for collaborative innovators who are passionate about making their mark on emerging enterprise software products. We’re building and developing cloud technology for the automotive retail industrythat will change the landscape for automotive dealers, original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and the customers they serve.Be Part of Something BiggerEach year, more than three percent of the U.S. gross domestic product (GDP) is attributed to the auto industry, which flows through our customer, the auto dealer. It’s time you joined an evolving marketplace where research and developmentinvestment is measured in the tens of billions. It’s time you were a part of something bigger.We’re expanding our workforce – engineers, architects, developers and more – onboarding early adopters who can optimize, pivot and keep pace with ever-evolving development roadmaps and applications.Join Our TeamGrowth potential, flexibility and material impact on the success and quality of a next-gen, enterprise software product make CDK an excellent choice for those who thrive in challenging, fast-paced engineering environments.The possibilities for impact are endless. We have exceptional opportunities to evolve our industry by driving change through new technology.', 'Demonstrate an ability to work in a team environment.', 'Software Engineer II(SQL Server/SSIS ETL Developer)', 'Support existing Production ETL processes', 'Run and manage complex Production ETL processes', 'CDK Global knows you have passions outside of work.  You have family, friends, sporting events, and lots of things going on.   That’s why we offer a comprehensive benefits package to not only take care of you but your family as well.   All of our benefits are effective the first day of employment including 401K matching, paid time off to re-energize, donate your time to volunteer in your community, and tuition reimbursement to name a few.', 'Power the Possibilities', 'Job Summary:', 'Develop new systems by following established SDLC processes and procedures with limited or no supervision.', '1+ years hands-on development experience with SQL Server or other Windows Relational Database Management System.', '1+ years of C#, .Net, or Java development experience.', 'Review and enhance department documentation on existing processes both to enhance training and disperse information on processes as changes are made. ', 'Work with the project team and/or end users to gather and translate requirements into technical specifications where appropriate', 'At CDK, we pride ourselves on having a diverse workforce. We value and celebrate the uniqueness of individuals and the different perspectives they provide. We offer equal opportunity employment regardless of race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability status, age, marital status, or protected veteran status.', 'Occasionally attend new project meetings where requirements are obtained.', 'If you’re ready for high-impact, you’re ready for CDK.', 'Responsibilities ', 'Join Our Team', 'Ability to write and troubleshoot T-SQL scripts and stored procedures', 'Familiarity with importing/exporting data to/from a database environment.', 'Assist the ETL group in developing solutions for data archival and delivery, supporting both internal and external customers. ', 'Familiarity with the Automotive industry would be a preference, though not a requirement.', "Working toward or completed Bachelor's Degree in computer related field or 2 years professional experience in a computer support or help desk position.", 'Qualifications ', 'Implement SQL Server Integrated Services packages to process business data using existing business rules']

['', 'Self-starter able to work with little supervision.', 'Education and Experience', 'Scope and Accountability', "The position will interface primarily with internal staff and will have a high level of impact on customer satisfaction based on customers' experience with Clinicient's product, the release process, and customer service levels. Debug and resolve production issues across services and levels of the stack.   Build a great customer experience for people using your infrastructure.   Champion, role model, and embed Samsara’s cultural principles (Obsess Over the Customer, Build for the Long Term, Growth Mindset) as we scale globally and across new offices.  ', ' Experience working with web services deployed on Cloud providers such as AWS or Azure ', ' Enjoy working collaboratively with developers of other teams, various use-cases ', "  Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent practical experience   4+ years of experience on backend-focused teams   Strong programming/coding fundamentals   Experience working with web services deployed on Cloud providers such as AWS or Azure  "]

['', 'We are seeking a Senior System Engineer. ', 'At System Soft Technologies, we are a family unit powered by diversity, inclusion, transparency, respect, integrity and passion for our clients and our people. job_text: ['', 'Bachelor’s degree in a qualified engineering field or a related discipline from an accredited college or university with a minimum of 20 years of general systems engineering experience, a Master’s degree or PhD in a qualified engineering field or a related discipline from an accredited college or university with a minimum of 18 years of general systems engineering experience, or a high school diploma or GED with a minimum of 24 years of general systems engineering experience.Ability to assemble, lead, and manage high-performing teams through an adaptive leadership style. Experience working in a matrix management construct with responsibility for technical outcomes while team leads are responsible for management, especially assignment and accountability of resources, to support specific threads.Experience creating thread reviews respective of assigned threads that clearly display the assigned set of use cases, mission outcomes, and measures of success.Experience providing insight into the various organizations’ priorities and “care-abouts” regarding assigned threads and report back to Government Leadership, particularly early on, and also provide reciprocal feedback from the Government Leadership to the partner organizations. Collaboration with these partner organizations will require interaction with civilian, military, and contractor staff of various experience levels to achieve outcomes.Provide analysis across the enterprise on implementation strategies, engineering processes, identification of gaps and needs, and efficiencies/duplication avoidance.Support development, decision tracking, and cross-thread analysis; working with other thread leads to further develop thread concepts, configuration management, prioritization of processes, and document decisions.Provide thought leadership in the areas of the business knowledge and enterprise data standards to implement strategies that benefit the enterprise.Knowledge of systems engineering documentation end-to-end to include, but not limited to, DoDAF architecture products, CONOPS, ICD’s, capabilities documents, SEP’s, test plans, hardware & software design documentation, requirements specifications, design specifications, etc.Analysis of design and implementation alternatives, tradeoffs, and recommendations.Strong oral, written, and interpersonal communications skills.Ability to work independently as well as within a team setting to complete assigned tasks within expected.Flexible/easily adaptable within a dynamic work environment that may require surge effortsPosition requires TS/SCI clearance with polygraph', 'Provide thought leadership in the areas of the business knowledge and enterprise data standards to implement strategies that benefit the enterprise.', 'Ability to work independently as well as within a team setting to complete assigned tasks within expected.', 'Integrating national and tactical data architectures into enterprise data representations (or formats) that can produce outputs to support multiple system architectures. This includes systems and data architecture and integration, data modeling, and data mapping in direct support of enterprise technology leadership.Maintaining awareness of commercial data standards and community data standardization activities.Corporate architecture and tools.', 'Possessing an instinctive aptitude to leverage information and knowledge sharing networks and navigate conflict in a way that fosters constructive outcomes. ', 'Ability to assemble, lead, and manage high-performing teams through an adaptive leadership style. ', 'Integrating national and tactical data architectures into enterprise data representations (or formats) that can produce outputs to support multiple system architectures. This includes systems and data architecture and integration, data modeling, and data mapping in direct support of enterprise technology leadership.', 'Strong oral, written, and interpersonal communications skills.', 'Experience working in a matrix management construct with responsibility for technical outcomes while team leads are responsible for management, especially assignment and accountability of resources, to support specific threads.', 'Coordinating across teams that leverage multiple development methodologies (e.g., Waterfall, Agile (Scrum & Kanban), Spiral, etc.) simultaneously.', 'Performing high-level requirements analysis to support application of data standards across the enterprise. Duties require a broad range of knowledge including information technology, requirements, technical architecture analysis (e.g., understanding data flow diagrams, system architecture diagrams, etc.), and an understanding of functional and system analysis.', 'Qualifications', 'Knowledge of systems engineering documentation end-to-end to include, but not limited to, DoDAF architecture products, CONOPS, ICD’s, capabilities documents, SEP’s, test plans, hardware & software design documentation, requirements specifications, design specifications, etc.', 'Corporate architecture and tools.', 'Experience providing insight into the various organizations’ priorities and “care-abouts” regarding assigned threads and report back to Government Leadership, particularly early on, and also provide reciprocal feedback from the Government Leadership to the partner organizations. Collaboration with these partner organizations will require interaction with civilian, military, and contractor staff of various experience levels to achieve outcomes.', 'Maintaining awareness of commercial data standards and community data standardization activities.', 'Position requires TS/SCI clearance with polygraph', 'Bachelor’s degree in a qualified engineering field or a related discipline from an accredited college or university with a minimum of 20 years of general systems engineering experience, a Master’s degree or PhD in a qualified engineering field or a related discipline from an accredited college or university with a minimum of 18 years of general systems engineering experience, or a high school diploma or GED with a minimum of 24 years of general systems engineering experience.', 'Experience creating thread reviews respective of assigned threads that clearly display the assigned set of use cases, mission outcomes, and measures of success.', 'Performing high-level requirements analysis to support application of data standards across the enterprise. Duties require a broad range of knowledge including information technology, requirements, technical architecture analysis (e.g., understanding data flow diagrams, system architecture diagrams, etc.), and an understanding of functional and system analysis.Coordinating across teams that leverage multiple development methodologies (e.g., Waterfall, Agile (Scrum & Kanban), Spiral, etc.) simultaneously.Possessing an instinctive aptitude to leverage information and knowledge sharing networks and navigate conflict in a way that fosters constructive outcomes. ', 'Flexible/easily adaptable within a dynamic work environment that may require surge efforts', 'Support development, decision tracking, and cross-thread analysis; working with other thread leads to further develop thread concepts, configuration management, prioritization of processes, and document decisions.', 'Provide analysis across the enterprise on implementation strategies, engineering processes, identification of gaps and needs, and efficiencies/duplication avoidance.', 'Analysis of design and implementation alternatives, tradeoffs, and recommendations.', 'Description']

You love challenges and problem solving and have no fear for the unknown You are Agile-minded, have a positive mindset and put quality first You understand that building AI-driven features is a team-effort that entails much more than training a model ', 'Learning and development programs to advance your career and personal growth', ' Competitive compensation, and private company equity  Inclusive benefits package allowing enrollment of dependents and partners A flexible culture that understands the importance of quality of work over quantity An opportunity to work with a diverse, global community of 600+ Collibrians across 18 countries, united by our value of open, direct, and kind A culture of company-wide collaboration and shared success.  Company supported and employee driven resource groups that promote diversity, career development and empowerment Learning and development programs to advance your career and personal growth Corporate social responsibility initiatives with global reach Regular recognition, feedback, and open communication across all levels Team building, bonding, mentorship and support to grow confidence, trust and friendships ', 'We Offer', 'Regular recognition, feedback, and open communication across all levels', "How You'll Make An Impact At Collibra", 'You can easily find, process and clean data for any project', 'Company supported and employee driven resource groups that promote diversity, career development and empowerment', 'Competitive compensation, and private company equity ', 'You Have', 'You don’t stop at delivering AI models to our engineering teams. You have a high impact on our data-intelligence platform by being an internal user. You use our catalog to track model input data as well as govern our models and show the path for model governance.', 'GCP and AWS are home to most of our work but we are also working on the ‘Edge’You work in a very diverse team of AI engineers, AI experts and Machine Learning operations engineers because we deliver end-to-end MLaaS solutions to our stake Everything we do is continuously delivered so all your commits are ready-for-production', 'Having solid knowledge of relational databases and other database technologies (NoSQL, Graph databases …) are a great plus.', 'We also use technologies like Apache Spark, Keras, TensorFlow, etc.']

['', 'Document and maintain software functionality', 'Expert level experience in Java (6+ years)', 'Experience with the following technologies', 'We offer competitive compensation, full benefits and some great perks. More importantly, we offer you the chance to work with a great team!', 'Linux/UNIX and shell scriptingOSGi and/or KarafElasticsearchCassandra or other NoSQL databasesActiveMQ, Kafka or other messaging systems', 'What You Bring', 'Execute the full Software Development Life-Cycle (SDLC)Collaborate with other developers and the open-source communityWrite well-designed, testable codeIntegrate software components into a fully functional software systemDocument and maintain software functionalityProvide recommendations for improvements in the overall development process', 'The OpenNMS Group is seeking an experienced, energetic and passionate Senior Software Engineer\xa0to join our growing team focused on building and growing our established world class open source Network Monitoring Solution in use by numerous Fortune 500 companies.', 'Senior Software Engineer', 'ActiveMQ, Kafka or other messaging systems', 'Employee discounts on things like, mobile products and services, gym memberships, and a variety of additional entertainment options.', 'OSGi and/or Karaf', 'Linux/UNIX and shell scripting', 'OpenNMS provides a highly reliable, scalable and comprehensive fault, performance and traffic monitoring solution that easily integrates with business applications and workflows to monitor and visualize everything in a network. The OpenNMS platform monitors some of the largest networks in existence, covering the healthcare, technology, finance, government, education, retail and industrial sectors, many with tens of thousands of networked devices. Our customers include three of the top 5 companies on the Fortune 100, as well as multiple large and multi-state health providers and one of the largest electronic medical record providers in the United States.', 'Integrate software components into a fully functional software system', 'About The OpenNMS', 'Execute the full Software Development Life-Cycle (SDLC)', 'Bachelor’s degree (preferably in Computer Science or a related field)', 'Collaborate with other developers and the open-source community', 'Cassandra or other NoSQL databases', 'Flexible Style Paid Time Off with generous paid holidays.', 'The Basics', 'Excellent benefits package including medical (HMO/PPO), dental, and vision', 'Elasticsearch', 'We offer competitive compensation, full benefits and some great perks. More importantly, we offer you the chance to work with a great team!Excellent benefits package including medical (HMO/PPO), dental, and visionFlexible Style Paid Time Off with generous paid holidays.Employee discounts on things like, mobile products and services, gym memberships, and a variety of additional entertainment options.', '\xa0', 'Write well-designed, testable code', 'What We Bring', '* Due to Covid-19, this position is remote/home office based until our company transitions back into office. Our time frame for the transition is undetermined at this time. For any changes, we will update candidates during the interview process.', 'Provide recommendations for improvements in the overall development process']

['', 'Kazoo is looking for a smart & imaginative Senior\xa0Software Engineer\xa0that loves mobile development and can’t wait to code and architect game-play, features, tools, and make some fun games!', '-Proven ability to work effectively with small to large teams in a deadline-driven environment.', 'Kazoo was founded in 2019 by a small veteran team that always pour love and great care into every game we create. Our passionate developers, game designers, producers, software engineers, visual artists, and live operation gurus are based right in the heart of downtown Glendale, California.', '-Mobile experience is a must!', '-Expert Fluency in C#', '-Server side experience a plus!', '-A drive to regularly self-improve as an engineer and to help others', '-Excellent organization and efficient time management skills are required', 'Experience', '-6-10 years of experience as a software engineer in gaming', 'About Kazoo', 'The right fit is someone who enjoys creative problem solving, learning new technologies, loves gaming & collaborating, and taking ownership and pride in the work that they do. We are a small collaborative team and each member wears multiple hats to keep things fresh and interesting!', 'Responsibilities', '-Loves solving complicated problems when it comes to creative development and likes getting dirty fixing bugs and code optimization', 'Qualifications', '-Effective communication skills with developers of all technical skill level and backgrounds', '-Helps support architectural requirements and ensures there’s system cohesion', 'Competencies', '-Familiarity with git version control', '-User interface implementation experience', 'Education', '-Live ops experience an plus!', '-Has a magic touch and finesse when it comes to gameplay feel and polish', '-Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science is preferred', '-Networking & MP experience a plus!', '-6+ Experience with Unity development and consider themselves an expert', ' “Making innovative Mobile Games players love & keep coming back to!”', '-Collaborate with engineers, artists, designers, & producers to implement gameplay, tools, and features', '-Excellent oral and written communication skills', '-At least 6 years of professional game programming', 'This position is contract but could lead to full time employment', 'Senior\xa0Software Engineer\xa0', '-4+ years of Mobile experience']

job_title: Principal Data Scientist | Fortune 5 Healthcare Firm
job_text: ['', '• Applies experience from strategy consulting, analytics, and data engineering to successfully direct the development of statistical and mathematical analyses to support business decision making for one or more business functions. Seen as a thought leader', '• Works with senior leaders to identify opportunities to implement analytics solutions to business problems. Sets priorities and executes strategy for the analytics organization.', 'Very competitive pay, bonus, full medical, dental & vision benefits, and more', '• 5+ years of people management experience', '• Ability to translate business problems into analytical solutions.', 'Very competitive pay, bonus, full medical, dental & vision benefits, and moreA tight-knit team of passionate people and a tech-first businessAutonomy and end-to-end ownershipOpportunity for fast growth & promotion', "•Master's degree in a quantitative field or MBA strongly preferred.", 'Autonomy and end-to-end ownership', 'A tight-knit team of passionate people and a tech-first business', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', 'Join an unparalleled platform to make a difference in healthcare in the US and beyond!', 'Opportunity for fast growth & promotion', 'You will be part of a fast-paced, innovative, collaborative team, helping solve problems, drive impact, and deliver key insights to our customers by leveraging innovations in data science, machine & deep learning, and predictive modeling techniques. You will derive meaning from data and deploy robust solutions through provider-directed engagement channels (e.g., digital) that help consumers identify affordable care when they need it, and with whom.', '• Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field, or an equivalent combination of formal education and experience.', 'ON OFFER:', '• Autonomously leads the client relationship with senior business leaders as their single point of contact. Collaborates with business partners to understand their strategy, problems, and goals.', '• 5+ years’ experience strategy consulting or on strategy teams in large companies', '• Minimum 10 years of total business experience', '• Healthcare sector experience preferred', '• Strong knowledge of advanced analytics tools and languages to analyze large data sets from multiple data sources.', '\xa0', '• Manages analytics team(s) for one or more product areas.', '• 5+ years of business experience leading analyses and initiatives with a track record of business impact.', '• Demonstrates a strong ability to communicate technical concepts and implications to business partners.', 'Intelletec has partnered with a Fortune 5 Healthcare Firm. They are going through a massive transformation and are looking for a Principal Data Scientist to join the Analytics & Behavior Change team, you’ll build industry-leading analytics, data, and technology platforms to help reimagine health care. ', 'ROLE & RESPONSIBILITIES:', '• Plans for the current year in terms of strategy and operations.']

['', 'Qualifications of the Senior Systems Engineer:', 'Minimum BS in SWE, EE, CE, CSE.', 'Minimum BS in SWE, EE, CE, CSE.3-5yrs of experience with embedded systems, medical devices preferred.3-5yrs of experience with design for test (DFT).\xa0Good Project Management skills.Working knowledge of product development lifecycle.Working knowledge of Medical Device Development Life Cycle and Manufacturing.Design Controls and experience with FDA QSR 21 CFR Part 820 and ISO 13485.Test / characterization of PCBAs.Scripting for automated system testing using Python or similar language.Data analysis, parsing test results, etc.Solid documentation and data collection practices related to medical devices.Report bugs and feedback to drive continuous product improvement.Experience with oscilloscopes, multimeters, function generators, and other test equipment.Experience with ECAD programs such as Altium, MentorGraphics or similar.Generate formal test reports and present them to larger technical audiences.Experience in writing control software (C#/Python) for custom test equipment supporting novel device development.Familiarity with domestic and international regulations and industrial guidance documents (e.g., ISO, FDA guidance and CE Mark requirements).', 'Overview of the Senior Systems Engineer:', 'Facilitates cross-functional knowledge and experiences to promote the understanding and resolution of in-market and product development issues.', 'Leads system/product-level feasibility and risks assessments.', 'Scripting for automated system testing using Python or similar language.', 'Monthly, onsite massages are available at our office locations for free. (Will continue after COVID-19', 'Apply today! ', 'Experience in writing control software (C#/Python) for custom test equipment supporting novel device development.', 'Responsibilities of the Senior Systems Engineer:', 'Leads system/product-level feasibility and risks assessments.Facilitates cross-functional knowledge and experiences to promote the understanding and resolution of in-market and product development issues.Responsible for coordination of system-level product development and its integration.Serves as a resource to examine system behavior issues and bring to resolution for on-market products.Identifies opportunities and drives continuous improvement efforts in the development cycle.\xa0Works on complex issues where analysis of situation or data requires an in-depth evaluation of variable factors.Drives software/electrical project timelines and resource needs for device projects.', 'Report bugs and feedback to drive continuous product improvement.', '3-5yrs of experience with embedded systems, medical devices preferred.', 'Responsible for coordination of system-level product development and its integration.', 'Drives software/electrical project timelines and resource needs for device projects.', '3-5yrs of experience with design for test (DFT).', 'Data analysis, parsing test results, etc.', 'Annual performance bonus program', 'As a key member of the Device Development team, the Senior Systems Engineer is responsible for system integration activities across several projects for the development of electronics-based medical devices and test equipment/fixtures. This Systems Engineer translates voice of customer and stakeholder needs into system and product requirements, identifies potential hazards and assesses requirements to ensure that the product meets the user/business needs, develops design and process specifications for new hardware and software products, aids in product verification and validation, and provides support in sustaining activities. The expectation for the Systems Engineer is to regularly serve on smaller project core teams, act as a leader of technical excellence, and participate as an agent for continuous improvement within the Systems Engineering function. ', 'Apply today! Email Resume to Justin@pavetalent.com', 'Experience with ECAD programs such as Altium, MentorGraphics or similar.', 'Design Controls and experience with FDA QSR 21 CFR Part 820 and ISO 13485.', 'Serves as a resource to examine system behavior issues and bring to resolution for on-market products.', 'Solid documentation and data collection practices related to medical devices.', 'Experience with oscilloscopes, multimeters, function generators, and other test equipment.', 'Generate formal test reports and present them to larger technical audiences.', 'Familiarity with domestic and international regulations and industrial guidance documents (e.g., ISO, FDA guidance and CE Mark requirements).', '\xa0Works on complex issues where analysis of situation or data requires an in-depth evaluation of variable factors.', '401 w/ Employe Match', '3 weeks PTO and 2 floating holidays (17 days) + 10 company-paid holidays', 'Annual performance bonus program3 weeks PTO and 2 floating holidays (17 days) + 10 company-paid holidays401 w/ Employe MatchMonthly, onsite massages are available at our office locations for free. (Will continue after COVID-19', 'Working knowledge of product development lifecycle.', '\xa0Good Project Management skills.', 'Rewards & Benefits\xa0for the Senior Systems Engineer:', 'Working knowledge of Medical Device Development Life Cycle and Manufacturing.', 'Test / characterization of PCBAs.', 'Identifies opportunities and drives continuous improvement efforts in the development cycle.']

['', 'Growth opportunities throughout the company', 'factor of 10', ' Cloud Provider - AWS: EC2, Lambda, Aurora, ECS, SQS, SNS, Kinesis, S3, CloudFormation, CodePipeline, EKS, Elasticache etc. DSL-based Search: multiple large-scale Elasticsearch Clusters searched using our Disco Query Language (DQL) Event Bus: Kafka and Schema Registry Deployment: Terraform, Docker (via ECS), Consul for App Config, Service Discovery, Shared Secrets Visibility: ELK Stack for logging, Datadog, New Relic, Sentry.io Programming Languages: Kotlin, Python Transport Mechanisms: Protobuf, Avro, HTTP Rest/JSON CI/CD: Jenkins, CodePipeline, GitHub, Artifactory  ', 'Experience with some amount of ‘Big Data’ technologies such as: ElasticSearch, NoSql Stores, Kafka, Columnar Databases, DataFlow or Pipeline Systems, Graph DataStores.', 'Programming Languages: Kotlin, Python', 'Opportunity to be a part of a company that is revolutionizing the legal industry', 'We were the first movers to a cloud-based platform that has caused mass disruption within our market.', ' We were the first movers to a cloud-based platform that has caused mass disruption within our market. Our CEO is a true market visionary. He graduated with a computer science degree at the age of 15 and followed with a JD from Harvard Law School at the age of 19. His unparalleled insights into the fundamental issues in legal and the potential of technology and artificial intelligence to change our market at its core provide the guiding light for DISCO’s long-term strategy. We believe that product delivery professionals including product managers, product designers and engineers differ from one another by at least a factor of 10. At DISCO, we only hire the top 1%, pay them well, and with equity, everyone has effectively been getting a raise each and every day. Given our product first mindset, product professionals are very much stars of the show. Our logo, the circle and square, represents the best lawyers and the best product professionals in the world. We measure product delivery velocity by dollars of revenue per line of code, vs simply lines of code. This drives a very thoughtful and deliberate product design and development process that ensures we’re going to make money when we ship products. We hire many more product managers and designers per engineer than most companies to ensure that our engineers have a disambiguated product intent when they are building. As a rule, we don’t commit to external product delivery dates as we believe that unnecessarily constrains our creativity from both a product and technology point of view. At DISCO respect isn’t earned at DISCO it is assumed. Good humans inherently treat everyone respectfully. This is a very important concept at DISCO. Given the high caliber of talent, the cutting-edge cloud-based technology stack, and thoughtful and novel product and design approach, you’ll find yourself learning at a rate you’ve not likely experienced in your career. Given that we only hire professionals that are passionate about their craft, you’ll truly enjoy building a great software product and get in the best “career shape” of your life. Over the next 4 years, we’ll be growing our product delivery organization. There will be incredible growth opportunities along the way. We use the “2 Pizza Team” organization design where small autonomous teams own a piece of a product or platform and ship software at rates comparable to a very lean and scrappy startup. We achieve consistency across these teams in the areas of design, product-wide use cases and technical concerns through a strategically focused set of overlay functions. Finally, while we’re an incredibly fast-growing organization, as a rule, we do not work crazy long hours. We believe in continuous product delivery, continuous product planning and design, continuous regular sleep schedules, continuous regular vacation, and continuous fun if you’re passionate about your craft. ', 'The ability to reason about and communicate external and internal architectural perspectives of well-encapsulated systems (e.g. Service Oriented Architecture, Docker-based Services, micro-services).', 'Visibility: ELK Stack for logging, Datadog, New Relic, Sentry.io', 'Over the next 4 years, we’ll be growing our product delivery organization. There will be incredible growth opportunities along the way.', ' Experience using Feature or Release Toggles as a code branching strategy. Experience modifying and operating multi-tenant systems. Provide Linux and system administration services to support government systems. Provide system administration support and administer, configure, and troubleshoot Red Hat Linux servers and workstations. ['', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Experience with Agile development methodology.', 'Expert in mobile software development using Swift, Objective C, Xcode IDE, CocoaTouch, & Git.', 'You thrive in a fast-paced environment focused on delivering production code at a regular cadence using Agile techniques, tools and methodologies. ['', 'An architect must be able to identify and solve for generic solutions to common the client’s problems (aka patterns) eg. data federation', 'This is a great opportunity to get in with a stable and growing organization that values technology and the people that drive it. Shift is a leading end-to-end auto e-commerce platform transforming the used car industry with a technology-driven, hassle-free customer experience. Shift’s mission is to make buying or selling a used car fun, fair, and accessible to everyone. We provide comprehensive, digital solutions throughout the car ownership lifecycle: finding the right car, having a test drive brought to you before buying the car, a seamless digitally-driven purchase transaction including financing and vehicle protection products, an efficient, digital trade-in/sale transaction, and a vision to provide high-value support services during car ownership.', 'Have managed data dictionaries and implemented processes to ensure data quality at your workplace', 'At Shift, we’re all about growth - which means people who are eager to grow, who are ready to roll up their sleeves and learn new things. We’ll take the open-minded go-getter over the pure subject matter expert any day. In that spirit, we also care about building a diverse and inclusive workplace and company. To put it simply, cars are meant for everyone, so we believe our company should be, too. We never discriminate against any candidate on the basis of gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, race, ethnicity, religion, color, national origin, marital status, veteran status or disability status. We welcome and encourage people of all backgrounds and walks of life to apply, even if you’re unsure if you meet all the requirements. pipelines  Communicating complex ideas effectively to a variety of audiences  Collaborating with engineering teams to continuously strengthen our machine learning pipeline  Mentoring other members of the team ', ' Researching real-time emerging fraud patterns with the Risk Analysis team ', ' Working with distributed data pipelines ', ' Building production machine learning models that identify fraud ', 'Agile: Some days you may spend doing research and designing experiments while others are spent using your analytical toolbox to surface insights into real-time fraud attacks. ', ' Practical SQL knowledge ', 'Design for Scale: ', 'Tenacious: ', "This position requires you to be located in the USThe Data Science team at Signifyd builds the models that power our fraud detection engine. Our machine learning pipeline keeps us one step ahead of fraudsters and their constantly evolving tactics and our research and experiments develop into new products that improve the merchant payments experience.We expect our data scientists to be hands-on. We carry solutions from a brainstorm to experimentation and all the way to deployment. We’re a varied group with a diversity of strengths -- some team members came to us from academic backgrounds, others from engineering, some from big companies and some from small, but all of us are curious and collaborative.We are looking for someone who embodies our company values:Curious and Hungry: Be willing to do research and design experiments by being hands-onTenacious: Creating something new is hard work, and our Data Scientist team never gives upCustomer Passion: Be the backbone to our platform, and help us stay ahead of fraudstersDesign for Scale: Work with the rest of the Data Science team to make fraud protection at scale possibleAgile: Some days you may spend doing research and designing experiments while others are spent using your analytical toolbox to surface insights into real-time fraud attacks. Roll Up Your Sleeves: Partner closely internally to learn from others, and succeed as a teamHow You’ll Have An Impact Building production machine learning models that identify fraud  Designing new algorithms that optimize all the key components of the Signifyd Commerce Protection Platform  Writing production and offline analytical code in Python and Java  Researching real-time emerging fraud patterns with the Risk Analysis team  Working with distributed data pipelines  Communicating complex ideas effectively to a variety of audiences  Collaborating with engineering teams to continuously strengthen our machine learning pipeline  Mentoring other members of the team Past Experience You’ll Need Bachelor's degree in computer science, applied mathematics, or an analytical field  An advanced degree (M.S. or Ph.D) in computer science, applied mathematics, or an analytical field is highly preferred  At least 3+ years of experience  Hands-on statistical analysis with a solid fundamental understanding  Designing experiments and collecting data  Writing code and reviewing others’ in a shared codebase, preferably in Python and Java  Practical SQL knowledge  Familiarity with the Linux command line Experience We Love To See Data analysis in a distributed environment  Passion for writing well-tested production-grade code  Using visualizations to communicate analytical results to stakeholders outside your team  Previous work in fraud, payments, or e-commerce", 'How You’ll Have An Impact', 'Past Experience You’ll Need']

['', '-Experience with big data technologies like Snowflake, Spark, Scala, Kafka, Hbase, Hadoop, HDFS, AVRO, MongoDB, Redshift, and Mesos is a plus', 'FLSA:\xa0', 'FLSA:\xa0Exempt', 'The Data Services team mission is to unify data across the enterprise to optimize business decisions made at the strategic, tactical, and operational levels of the organization. We accomplish this by providing an Enterprise Data Warehouse, reporting platform, and business processes that provide quality data, in a timely fashion, from any channel of the company and present them in such a manner to maximize the value of that data for both internal and external customers.', '-Advanced to Expert working knowledge of ANSI SQL or Microsoft Transact-SQL (T-SQL) and demonstrated ability to create ad-hoc SQL queries to analyze data, create prototypes, etc.', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR:', '-Experience with visual data analysis using tools such as Tableau, QlikView/QlikSense, Microstrategy, or other Business Intelligence platforms.', '-1-year experience programing in C++, C#, or Python a plus', '-Positive and creative attitude', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:\xa0', 'Education:', '-Minimum 3 years of experience with Snowflake, MS SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB required', '-Design database systems and develop tools for real-time and offline analytic processing', 'DEPARTMENT:\xa0', '-Analytical', 'DIRECT REPORTS:', '-Interact cross-functionally with a variety of people, teams, and management. Work closely with analysts from sales, marketing, HR, and Finance, as well as product development, and data scientists, to identify opportunities and assess improvements of our products and services', '-Strong organizational skills with the ability to prioritize and execute tasks across multiple projects with tight deadlines and aggressive goals.', '-Standardize data that helps generate insights and addresses reporting needs', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0', '-Design, develop, and test moderate to complex ETL processes using a variety of tools, which may include Transact-SQL, SSIS, Stored Procedures, -Functions, and existing ETL tool accelerators in Snowflake or SQL Server 2014 and later environments.', '-Determine methods and procedures for new or existing standards, operating procedures, and data processing tools.', '-Contribute to the definition and development of the overall data roadmap by making recommendations', 'ABOUT THE JOB:', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:\xa0Direct Hire', '-Participate in research, development, and adoption of trends in big data, BI, and analytics', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', 'Experience:', '-Minimum 3 years of experience with database design and development required', '-Produce and maintain accurate project documentation for moderate to complex ETL processes', 'POSITION:\xa0Senior Data Engineer', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', '-Perform Data Services benchmarking, enhancements, optimizations, and platform analytics', '-Detail oriented', '-Excellent verbal and written communication skills.', '-Quality driven', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0N/A', 'The Senior Data Engineer is responsible for designing and developing automated ETL processes for Business Intelligence reporting to facilitate business operations. This role will be part of a team adopting and implementing new data technologies and tools like Spark, Scala, HBase, Hadoop, HDFS, MongoDB and/or others to provide faster, more accurate, and deeper insights into our products and services. As a senior member of the growing data services and business analytics team, this person will be a key contributor to the successful deployment of strategic future state capabilities critical for our business. It will be this person’s responsibility to perform code reviews, identify additional opportunities for efficiency, mentor team members, and be the subject matter expert for specific areas of the Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW). Over time, these subject areas will be rotated to ensure each senior member gets an opportunity to have a full knowledge of the EDW.', '-Experience with public or hybrid cloud environments are a plus.', '-Perform peer code reviews for other Seniors and Data Engineers, as well as train, mentor, and provide guidance to Data Engineers and other Data -Services and business users on processes and standards the Data Services group has established', 'SCHEDULE:', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR:\xa0Solutions Architect, Data Services', '\xa0', 'Knowledge/Skills/Abilities:', 'POSITION:', '-Integrate data from a variety of sources, assuring that they adhere to data quality and accessibility standards', "Education:\xa0Bachelor's degree preferred or equivalent experience\xa0", '-Independently design an effective and maintainable solution based on the gathered requirements that meet reliability, accuracy, and performance standards while also meeting or exceeding the user expectations', 'DEPARTMENT:\xa0Data Services\xa0', 'SCHEDULE:\xa0Standard business hours', '-Minimum 5 years of experience with SQL required', '-Committed to personal development and professional growth', 'DIRECT REPORTS:\xa0No', '-Collaborate with various data providers to resolve data issues', '\ufeffPersonal Attributes:', '-Passionate about data', 'ABOUT THE TEAM:']

job_title: Data Scientist up to $250,000 plus Equity [715]
job_text: ['', '\ufeff', 'We are looking for people who have done work in one of the following areas:', '• Causal Reasoning Ideal candidates would be able to rapidly iterate on new ideas with engineers, potentially publish at top conferences and be able to write code.', 'Candidates will need to have a PhD preferably in Artificial Intelligence or Machine Learning. We are looking for people who have done work in one of the following areas:\xa0', '• Deep Neural Networks', '• Unsupervised Learning', 'Company Description:', 'One of our clients is looking to hire a "Data Scientist up to $250,000 plus Equity" in San Francisco Bay Area. Please find the job details below-', '• Generative Adversarial Networks', 'Generative Modeling\xa0', 'Causal Reasoning Ideal candidates would be able to rapidly iterate on new ideas with engineers, potentially publish at top conferences and be able to write code.', 'Data Scientist\xa0', '• Deep Reinforcement Learning', 'Deep Reinforcement Learning\xa0', 'Deep Neural Networks', 'Responsible for coming up with new techniques in unsupervised learning, dataset augmentation and deep reinforcement learning that can be applied to automating various parts of the AI development workflow.', 'Required Skills:', '• Generative Modeling', 'Data Scientist up to $250,000 plus Equity"', 'Job Description:', 'Responsibilities:', 'General Requirements:', 'Generative Adversarial Networks', 'Candidates will need to have a PhD preferably in Artificial Intelligence or Machine Learning.', 'San Francisco Bay Area. ', 'Unsupervised Learning\xa0', 'Responsible for coming up with new techniques in unsupervised learning, dataset augmentation and deep reinforcement learning that can be applied to automating various parts of the AI development workflow.\xa0', 'We are a stealth startup building a cutting edge cloud AI service. Our founders have a wealth of experience working on various ground-breaking products including self driving cars, AWS AI services, GMail, Google Docs and flash storage systems. They have also previously been founders and early employees at startups. We are backed by Eric Schmidt and Decibel Ventures with $18 million in Series A.']

This position is based in Washington state, either the Seattle or Bellingham areas.']

job_title: Principal Data Scientist - Human Capital Analytics
job_text: ['', 'Description', 'Advanced proficiency in statistical software like R, SAS, SPSS, etc.', 'The Principal Data Scientist develops, maintains, and collects structured and unstructured data sets for analysis and reporting.', 'The Principal Data Scientist develops, maintains, and collects structured and unstructured data sets for analysis and reporting.Creates reports, projections, models, and presentations to support business strategy and tactics.Works with senior executives to develop and drive segment or enterprise-wide functional strategies.Advises one or more areas, programs or functions and provides recommendations to senior executives on matters of significance, and as an advanced subject matter expert competent to work at very high levels in multiple knowledge and functional areas across the enterprise.', 'Experience in creating reports, projections, models, and presentations to support business strategy and tactics', 'Required Qualifications', 'Ability to work at very high levels in multiple knowledge and functional areas across the enterprise', 'Successful demonstrated experience in working with senior executives to develop and drive segment or enterprise-wide functional strategies', 'Creates reports, projections, models, and presentations to support business strategy and tactics.', 'Must be passionate about contributing to an organization focused on continuously improving consumer experiences', 'Responsibilities', 'The People Analytics team at Humana takes a customer centric approach to optimizing talent outcomes and improving the associate experience. We provide advanced analytic products and consulting to our Enterprise business leaders and HR centers of excellence. Our passion for improving the associate experience is supported through a strategy of a strong data infrastructure, analytic product development, and advanced data science capabilities.', 'Ability to advise one or more areas, programs or functions', "Master's degree and 10 or more years of experience in data analytics2 or more years project and/or people leadership experienceExperience in using mathematics, statistics, modeling, business analysis, and technology to transform high volumes of complex data into advanced analytic solutionsAdvanced proficiency in statistical software like R, SAS, SPSS, etc.Experience with providing strategic advice and guidance to functional teamsExperience in developing, maintaining, and collecting structured and unstructured data sets for analysis and reportingExperience in creating reports, projections, models, and presentations to support business strategy and tacticsSuccessful demonstrated experience in working with senior executives to develop and drive segment or enterprise-wide functional strategiesAbility to advise one or more areas, programs or functionsAbility to work at very high levels in multiple knowledge and functional areas across the enterpriseMust be passionate about contributing to an organization focused on continuously improving consumer experiences", 'Experience in developing, maintaining, and collecting structured and unstructured data sets for analysis and reporting', '2 or more years project and/or people leadership experience', 'Works with senior executives to develop and drive segment or enterprise-wide functional strategies.', 'Advises one or more areas, programs or functions and provides recommendations to senior executives on matters of significance, and as an advanced subject matter expert competent to work at very high levels in multiple knowledge and functional areas across the enterprise.', 'The Principal Data Scientist will enhance and mature the vision of People Analytics at Humana. The principal drives analytic value by working with business customers to identify and prioritize advanced analytic use cases. They will deliver analytic output and lead a team of data scientists. The principal will partner and consult with executives in the business, set objectives, and execute on a customer-centric approach of delivery.', 'Experience in using mathematics, statistics, modeling, business analysis, and technology to transform high volumes of complex data into advanced analytic solutions', 'Experience with people systems and technologies', 'Advanced Degree in a quantitative discipline, such as Mathematics, Economics, Finance, Statistics, Computer Science, Engineering or related field', "Master's degree and 10 or more years of experience in data analytics", 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Advanced Degree in a quantitative discipline, such as Mathematics, Economics, Finance, Statistics, Computer Science, Engineering or related fieldExperience with people systems and technologies', 'Experience with providing strategic advice and guidance to functional teams']

Interns typically work a full-time schedule of 40 hours a week throughout a 10-14-week assignment starting in May of 2021.', 'Experience with programming in Java', 'The Impact You’ll Make in this Role', 'Supporting Your Well-being', '3M Global Terms of Use and Privacy Statement', 'Familiarity with basic Natural Language Processing techniques', 'Currently pursuing a Bachelor’s degree or higher (verified prior to start) from an accredited institutionExperience with programming in Java', 'Currently pursuing a Bachelor’s degree or higher (verified prior to start) from an accredited institution', 'Current cumulative GPA of 3.0 on a 4.0 scale', 'Currently pursuing a Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science (or a related field) from an accredited institutionCurrent cumulative GPA of 3.0 on a 4.0 scaleCompleted a minimum of junior year (6 semesters) by the start of the assignmentAbility to demonstrate understanding of algorithms, data structures and other factors that affect code quality and performanceFamiliarity with basic Natural Language Processing techniques']

['', ' Knowledge of low-level Linux, UNIX networking and C system calls for high performance computing and debugging', ' Experience working in a test-driven development and agile environment', ' Solid understanding of algorithms and data structures, knowledge of object-oriented design and multi-threading', ' Knowledge of low-level Linux, UNIX networking and C system calls for high performance computing and debugging Experience with systems level Java or Scala Experience with Hadoop and/or using a distributed analytics infrastructure like Apache Spark', "Engineering Data Services group is responsible for core data and analytics services that are used across Bloomberg's application teams. Our service stack currently runs on over 900 machines and serves over 120 billion requests a day. With ever increasing data volumes and growth of Bloomberg's Enterprise products, this footprint has been growing at a rapid pace year over year. Our team also provides multiple foundational services such as meta data and id master for our Bloomberg Query Language (BQL), the next generation analytics and screening engine for financial datasets.We are building out a suite of tools that help developers support and optimize our data services.  One such tool, our data integrity checker, is required to verify 50 billion unique data points daily to detect anomalies. This immense scale requires the use of Hadoop and Spark analytics framework.  We are developing a set of brand new services for metadata, security & entity relationships and entitlement. Due to the large volume and explosive growth of underlying data we are looking to leverage Hadoop based storage for these services.  We are also building new tools to manage our server farm more efficiently and leverage analytics to ensure high availability, efficient load balancing and fair scheduling.", ' Participate in the full SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle) of various components and systems that are required to be highly efficient, robust and scalable', ' Experience with Hadoop and/or using a distributed analytics infrastructure like Apache Spark', ' Enhance our infrastructure to fulfill mission critical SLAs, whether low latency or high throughput data retrieval', ' 3+ years of C++ or Java on UNIX/Linux environment', ' Experience with systems level Java or Scala', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', "We are looking for strong C++/Java software engineers who can design and develop low latency, high performance distributed systems. The ideal candidate should have strong programming skills, the ability to work collaboratively and a proven track record of delivering quality engineering solutions to real world problems. Our team is comprised of a small group of technologists passionate about data and pushing the boundaries of technology to deliver innovative solutions. We expect you to be proactive, able to work independently and take ownership in driving the vision and execution of the product.We'll trust you to:", ' 3+ years of C++ or Java on UNIX/Linux environment Solid understanding of algorithms and data structures, knowledge of object-oriented design and multi-threading Excellent problem solving and communication skills, and ability to thrive in a highly collaborative and dynamic work environment Experience with high volume, high availability distributed systems Experience working in a test-driven development and agile environment', ' Design, implement and own critical applications and components of our services stack', ' Design, implement and own critical applications and components of our services stack Participate in the full SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle) of various components and systems that are required to be highly efficient, robust and scalable Enhance our infrastructure to fulfill mission critical SLAs, whether low latency or high throughput data retrieval Get to know development teams across Bloomberg, understand their application requirements and data access patterns', ' Experience with high volume, high availability distributed systems', ' Get to know development teams across Bloomberg, understand their application requirements and data access patterns', ' Excellent problem solving and communication skills, and ability to thrive in a highly collaborative and dynamic work environment']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Data Platform, Cloud Data Protection
job_text: ['', 'You have experience building distributed systems and working with cloud technologies such as Kuberrnetes, gRPC, message queues and object-stores.', 'You thrive in an entrepreneurial environment and you know how to solve problems with limited resources and time and iteratively improve those solutions over time.', 'About You', 'You will collaborate with other engineering teams, with product management and with Rubrik support staff on a weekly basis.', 'About The Job', 'Rubrik provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, Rubrik complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.', 'You will contribute to Rubrik’s platform, a unique approach to SaaS products that enables “Hybrid SaaS”, where the data-plane resides in the customers cloud account (Azure/AWS) while the control-plane is managed by Rubrik and resides in Rubrik’s cloud platform, Polaris.', ' You will lead the Design and build complex systems software to advance the state of Rubrik’s cloud platform and Cloud Data Protection products (O365/AWS/Azure). You will contribute to Rubrik’s platform, a unique approach to SaaS products that enables “Hybrid SaaS”, where the data-plane resides in the customers cloud account (Azure/AWS) while the control-plane is managed by Rubrik and resides in Rubrik’s cloud platform, Polaris. You will own the the product end-to-end, from working on product requirements with internal stakeholders, to building, testing, deploying and managing the deployments. You will collaborate with other engineering teams, with product management and with Rubrik support staff on a weekly basis. ', 'You hold a bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field with a minimum of 8+ years of prior experience in a software engineering role.', ' You hold a bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field with a minimum of 8+ years of prior experience in a software engineering role. You have experience building distributed systems and working with cloud technologies such as Kuberrnetes, gRPC, message queues and object-stores. You thrive in an entrepreneurial environment and you know how to solve problems with limited resources and time and iteratively improve those solutions over time. You have significant prior experience leading teams, delivering complex projects successfully and mentoring and growing those teams. ', 'You have significant prior experience leading teams, delivering complex projects successfully and mentoring and growing those teams.', 'About The Team', 'You will lead the Design and build complex systems software to advance the state of Rubrik’s cloud platform and Cloud Data Protection products (O365/AWS/Azure).', 'About Rubrik', 'You will own the the product end-to-end, from working on product requirements with internal stakeholders, to building, testing, deploying and managing the deployments.']

job_title: Data Architecture and Strategy Mgr / Chief Data and Analytics Officer
job_text: ['', ' Meet and understand the business and engineering customers/partners and their subject areas in order to capture and understand their current-state architectures (processes/systems/data/roles) and detail their needs/requests/requirements/desires across our Lines of Businesses (LOBs) and Multi-Functional Organizations (MFOs).', ' Will be responsible for leveraging data experts across the data organization in governance, AI, ML, advanced analytics and data services implementation', ' Collaboratively work with the Enterprise in the delivery of our data approach into a common capability that can be used across multiple business areas.', 'Develop governance and architecture standards and resulting command media where appropriate. This position will assist in driving audits and assessments of data throughout LM Space and guide it’s implementation into a service driven architecture that drives additional business value and reduces operating costs.', ' Ensure that all developed architectures are consistent with IT vision, mission and roadmaps', ' Engineer/develop future-state conceptual architectures that are implementable, secure, scalable and supportable and decompose those conceptual architectures into functions that can be allocated to processes/systems/data/roles.', ' Integrate and operationalize these architectures as required', ' Meet and understand the business and engineering customers/partners and their subject areas in order to capture and understand their current-state architectures (processes/systems/data/roles) and detail their needs/requests/requirements/desires across our Lines of Businesses (LOBs) and Multi-Functional Organizations (MFOs). Work directly with customers/partners, IT and BITEE collaboratively to define the solution space and lead trade analyses within and across the relevant domains – technical (IT and non-IT) and non-technical. Engineer/develop future-state conceptual architectures that are implementable, secure, scalable and supportable and decompose those conceptual architectures into functions that can be allocated to processes/systems/data/roles. Lead a team of data architects in modernizing the way we collect, organize, manage, visualize and analyze data across Space. Help deliver Big Data, Information Modernization and other critical project architecture definitions to support the deployment of a more cloud-oriented approach to Big Data in support of telemetry processing and delivery. Support proposal activities in support of our data approach. Collaboratively work with the Enterprise in the delivery of our data approach into a common capability that can be used across multiple business areas. Manage data architects throughout the CDAO in delivering on critical capabilities to support the Space business area. Will be responsible for leveraging data experts across the data organization in governance, AI, ML, advanced analytics and data services implementationDevelop governance and architecture standards and resulting command media where appropriate. This position will assist in driving audits and assessments of data throughout LM Space and guide it’s implementation into a service driven architecture that drives additional business value and reduces operating costs.', 'The Data Architect Sr Mgr Will Work As Part Of The Space CDAO Mission Area And Work Alongside The System Architect Mission Area To', ' Document/model and publish these architectures per methods and standards of the Space IT Architecture Team', ' Manage data architects throughout the CDAO in delivering on critical capabilities to support the Space business area.', ' Lead a team of data architects in modernizing the way we collect, organize, manage, visualize and analyze data across Space.', ' Work directly with customers/partners, IT and BITEE collaboratively to define the solution space and lead trade analyses within and across the relevant domains – technical (IT and non-IT) and non-technical.', ' Help deliver Big Data, Information Modernization and other critical project architecture definitions to support the deployment of a more cloud-oriented approach to Big Data in support of telemetry processing and delivery.', ' Ensure that all developed architectures are consistent with IT vision, mission and roadmaps Develop these architectures so that they integrate with the overall Space Enterprise Architecture, IT System of Systems Architecture and IT Domain Architectures Document/model and publish these architectures per methods and standards of the Space IT Architecture Team Integrate and operationalize these architectures as required', ' Develop these architectures so that they integrate with the overall Space Enterprise Architecture, IT System of Systems Architecture and IT Domain Architectures', ' Support proposal activities in support of our data approach.']

job_title: Backend Software Engineer - Maps (Routing Engine, APIs & Traffic)
job_text: ['', 'Basic Qualifications', "Bachelor's in Computer Science or related technical field or equivalent practical experience", 'Strong problem-solving skills, analytical capabilities, data analysis, and attention to detail.', 'Knowledge of large-scale data warehousing architecture, data modeling & ML', 'Working understanding of big data architecture and hands on building pipelines (using e.g. Hadoop, Hive, Hdfs, Kafka, Presto etc.)', 'Ability to collaborate across multiple levels of an organization', 'Experience with API development & building microservices', 'You will partner with a group of motivated and passionate problem solvers. We care about our inclusive culture, where everyone can share their talent.', 'About The Role', "You will partner with a group of motivated and passionate problem solvers. We care about our inclusive culture, where everyone can share their talent.Routing is central to Uber's success, you will work on exceptionally important and visible projects every day. Our code moves real people and things from point A to point B.We work with big data ranging from map data, geo-spatially indexed data and sensory data (GPS) that provides endless opportunities for modeling and analytics.Build world class distributed systems optimized for high throughput and low latency. Tackle challenging problems with cutting edge algorithms and machine learning models. You would be able to innovate and build things that have never been built before.", 'Experience as a developer, writing code for highly scalable software systems', 'Industry experience working on distributed systems: developing reliable, high performance, highly scalable and low latency software (primarily in Java)', "What You'll Do", 'Build world class distributed systems optimized for high throughput and low latency. Tackle challenging problems with cutting edge algorithms and machine learning models. You would be able to innovate and build things that have never been built before.', 'Proven experience designing and deploying high performance, highly scalable production services with extensive monitoring and logging practices', 'Ability to work with data scientists to launch and interpret results of experiments. This can involve interacting with large data processing pipelines, distributed data stores, and file systems.', "Bachelor's in Computer Science or related technical field or equivalent practical experienceExperience coding with C++, Java, Python, or Go", "At least four (4) years of software engineering experienceBachelor's Degree in Computer science or related fields (such as other Sciences or Math)Experience as a developer, writing code for highly scalable software systemsProven experience designing and deploying high performance, highly scalable production services with extensive monitoring and logging practicesAbility to debug and troubleshoot production issuesExperience with API development & building microservicesIndustry experience working on distributed systems: developing reliable, high performance, highly scalable and low latency software (primarily in Java)Ability to work with data scientists to launch and interpret results of experiments. This can involve interacting with large data processing pipelines, distributed data stores, and file systems.Working understanding of big data architecture and hands on building pipelines (using e.g. Hadoop, Hive, Hdfs, Kafka, Presto etc.)Knowledge of large-scale data warehousing architecture, data modeling & MLCapacity to understand and evaluate tradeoffs between correctness, robustness, performance, space, and time.Knowledge of graph traversal algorithms: Dijkstra’s, DFS, BFS, A*, contraction hierarchies, etc.Experience building geospatial services and datasets, such as maps data, traffic patterns, etc.Strong verbal and written communication and organization skills.Strong problem-solving skills, analytical capabilities, data analysis, and attention to detail.Ability to collaborate across multiple levels of an organization", "Routing is central to Uber's success, you will work on exceptionally important and visible projects every day. Our code moves real people and things from point A to point B.", 'Experience building geospatial services and datasets, such as maps data, traffic patterns, etc.', 'Ability to debug and troubleshoot production issues', 'Experience coding with C++, Java, Python, or Go', 'Strong verbal and written communication and organization skills.', 'We work with big data ranging from map data, geo-spatially indexed data and sensory data (GPS) that provides endless opportunities for modeling and analytics.', "Bachelor's Degree in Computer science or related fields (such as other Sciences or Math)", 'Capacity to understand and evaluate tradeoffs between correctness, robustness, performance, space, and time.', 'At least four (4) years of software engineering experience', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Knowledge of graph traversal algorithms: Dijkstra’s, DFS, BFS, A*, contraction hierarchies, etc.']
